siṃhalācāryaratnaśrījñānakṛtayā ratnaśriyā ṭīkayā samalaṃkṛtam ācāryadaṇḍikṛtaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇam |
body.div:
mārgavibhāgo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
caturmukhamukhāmbhojavanahaṃsavadhūrmama |
mānase ramatāṃ nityaṃ sarvaśuklā sarasvatī || 1 ||
mātṛkāyā ādimaṃ patratritayaṃ pracyutam | tena ṭīkākarturmaṅgalāṃcaraṇaṃ vyākhyā cādimayoḥ ślokayoḥ pūrṇatayā, tṛtīyasya ca bhāgaśo naṣṭā | ādaśamaṃ patreṣu punarāṃśikī truṭiḥ |* * * * * * * *
pūrvaśāstrāṇi saṃhṛtya prayogānupalakṣya ca |
yathāsāmarthyamasmābhiḥ kriyate kāvyalakṣaṇam || 2 ||

iha śiṣṭānuśiṣṭānāṃ śiṣṭānāmapi sarvathā |
vācāmeva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate || 3 ||
* * * *
[ 4a ] doṣavibhāgato yathāvada ..........mallanāgo ........ vasthitilakṣaṇatvācca lokayātrāyātula॰ — tanmūlakatvācca lokayātrāyāḥ — kāmasūtre 1. 2. 16 iti | viśiṣṭā lokayātrā [a]bhipretā na tu yā kācit | sā [vākśāstrarūpe]ti tadabhāve yathoktalokayātrānupapatteśca anyatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ sāmānyaśabdāt viśeṣaḥ prasattavyaḥ | prasādena prabhāvānna..........| ataeva caturvargaśāsanāt śāstrā[ṇāṃ] caturvargavidyāśrayatvāt vidyāśrayasthānānīti ca nirucyate | tāni ca [śruti]smṛtyādīni saṃskṛtamayānītyāha [śiṣṭānuśiṣṭānāmiti | śiṣṭāḥ] [śabdā]nuśāsanakṛtaḥ pāṇiniprabhṛtayaḥ | tairanuśiṣṭāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ prakṛtipratyayādivibhāgakalpanayā 'nvā[khyātāḥ] tāsāṃ vācāṃ, śrutismūtyādīni hi catu[rvargasādhanāni] [saṃ]skṛtamayāni dṛśyante |
nanu bhāṣāntarairapi caturvargapratītilakṣaṇā lokayātrā pravartamānā dṛ[śyamānā]sti | tadapi śrutyādimūlamityatidiśannāha- śiṣṭā[nāma]pīti | śiṣṭānuśiṣṭebhyo bāhyāḥ śiṣṭāḥ pariśiṣṭāḥ | upayuktādanyaḥ śeṣa iti | tāsāṃ [pariśiṣṭānāṃ śāstravyavahāra]sthityā apabhraṃśasaṃgṛhītānām | yad vakṣyati—śāstreṣu saṃskṛtādanyadapabhraṃśatayoditam | iti | [1.36] evaṃ manyate...[i]damatra tāvat tātpa[ryam]........[lo]kayātrā śāstraprabhāvādeveti | tattu śāstraṃ saṃskṛtamayaṃ vā | bhāṣāntarasvabhāvaṃ prāyastu saṃskṛtamayaṃ dṛśyata iti | ata evāha- śi[ṣṭānuśiṣṭānāṃ.........evaṃ śāstrādeva sā | saṃskṛtetaralakṣaṇastu tadvikalpa eva | ataḥ sarvathā sarvaprakāreṇa ekāntena saṃskṛtādavaśiṣṭād vā śāstrādeva loka[yātrā pravartate |] kāvyaṃ cedaṃ caturvargalakṣaṇam | atrāpi guṇadoṣavivecane śāstraṃ śaraṇamityākūtam | vakṣyati ca—guṇadoṣānaśāstrajñaḥ [1.8] ﻿
ityādinā | yat punara[tra........kā]raṇamanyad vā yathā kathañcid ghuṇākṣaraprakhyaṃ dṛśyate tatrāpi śāstramastīti tadvidāṃ prayogapathānusārāt syāt | janmāntare vā kṛtaśāstrābhyā[saprati (4b) bu]ddhasaṃskārāṇāṃ pariniṣṭhitamapi syāt | yān sārasvatānanadhītapaṇḍitān vā vyavaharati lokaḥ | yadapi sarasvatīprasādāt kāvyakaraṇādikamiṣṭam, tadapi śāstrapra[bhāva]........prabhāvitatvāt | kiṃ bahunā ? sarvalokayātrā caturvargavyutpattilakṣaṇā śāstrādeva | tasmādidamapi kāvyaguṇadoṣavyutpattyarthaṃ karaṇīyameva, yataḥ parini[ṣṭhitaṃ kāvyaṃ jāya]ta iti bhāvaḥ ||
evamanvayeta lokayātrāṃ śāstramūlāṃ pratipādyaitadeva vyatirekeṇa draḍhayannāha—
idamandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhūvanatrayam |
yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotirā saṃsārānna dīpyate || 4 ||
yadanantaramuktaṃ lokayā[trā]...........jyotirālokaḥ śabdāhvayaṃ śāstrasaṃjñakaṃ caturvargaprakāśakatvāt | śabda ityāhvayo yasyeti vigrahe, yadi na dīpyate na prakāśate na syādityarthaḥ | ke...........ro 'tra sattvalokaḥ | yaścaturvargamanutiṣṭhati tat maryādaṃ[?] ye tu muktāsteṣāṃ na saṃsārātmakatvam, nāpi caturvargānuṣṭhānam | sarva......[sva]rgamartyapātālalakṣaṇaṃ jagatrayaṃ sattvalokaḥ yasya caturvargapratipattiḥ sambhavati | idamiti | atya......tena vā tamo 'ndha[kāraḥ]........[la]kṣaṇalokayātrāvigamāt | apratipattikasaṃ[sārā]tmakaṃ syādityarthaḥ | kimekadeśena, netyāha- kṛts‍namiti | niravaśeṣaṃ nāṃśena tathāpya[lpam, netyā]ha- andhamiti | andhaṃ nirantarama[jñānatamoyogāt] caturvargapratipatteḥ kathañcidapyabhāvāt sarvathā nivṛttacaturvargajñānātmakaṃ jagat syāt | na ka[thañcid vastuprati]pattirbhavedityarthaḥ | yad vā, andhaṃtama.....[pṛ]ṣodarādidarśanāt siddham | arthastu sa eva | samādhiścaiṣa sarvathā 'jñāne nivṛtte sarvamatra gṛhyate [anva]yavyatirekābhyām | śāstrābhyāsaḥ kāvyaguṇadoṣavivekārthaṃ kriyata iti pūrvavadākūtam | ata evocyate—
śāstrādeva hi sarvatra guṇadoṣa[vicāra]ṇam |
vinā śāstreṇa yat...................... ||
......ghaṭakaṃ śāstraviśeṣa eṣa vastutaḥ | tatrāpi caturvargapratipatteḥ | yad vakṣyati—caturvargaphalāyattami[tyādi] [1.15] ﻿
......[5a] kāvyamiti vyavati[ṣṭhate]...........ityalaṃ vistareṇa ||
śāstrameva prakārāntareṇānusaṃharannāha—
ādirājayaśobimbamādarśaṃ prāpya vāḍmayam |
teṣāmasannidhāne 'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati ||5 ||
ādayaḥ ādyāḥ pūrve rājānaḥ manvā[dyāḥ] teṣāmādirājānāṃ [guṇakhyāpakaṃ karma] yaśaskaratvād yaśa ityuktam | guṇā hi sākṣāt teṣāṃ śāstre kāvye vā varṇyante | guṇānāṃ tu prasiddhiḥ sarvalokakīrttanaṃ yaśaḥ | tadeva [śa]rīraṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ........., śarīrapra[timatvāt | ta]duktam—
api svadehāt kimutendriyārthād
yaśodhanānāṃ hi yaśo garīyaḥ | iti |
[raghuvaṃśe 14.35]
tadetat | vāgiha itihāsakathādilakṣaṇā, ādirā[jayaśaḥ]kīrttanāt | tatsvabhāvamādarśaṃ darpaṇam vaimalyāt, prāpya tatra pratibhāya tatpratyayārūḍhaṃ svayamātmanā na naśyati nāpagacchati yasyeti vismāpayannabhimukhayati param | ko 'tra vismaya i[ti cet ?] teṣāmasannidhāne 'pīti teṣāmādirājānāṃ yeṣāṃ tadbimbam | asannidhāne 'pi abhāve 'pi | idamatra citraṃ yat tadvato 'pagame 'pi bimbaṃ nāpaiti | darpaṇe hi tāvad bimbaṃ dṛśyate [yāvad vastusa]nnidhānam | apagate tu tadvati śarīre 'paiti | so 'yaṃ prasiddhādarśavilakṣaṇo 'pūrva eva kaścidādarśaḥ, yatrādirājalakṣaṇasya tadvato 'sannidhāvapi idānīm[api] bimbaṃ dṛśyate, na kevalaṃ sannidhāna ityapiśabdārthaḥ | atiśaye vā 'piśabdo vartate | asannidhāne 'pyaho dṛśyata ityatiśayaḥ | ata eva sarvā[tiśāyī] sanātanaḥ ko 'pyayamāloko lokayātrāpravṛttaye | kuto 'pyayamābhāti yaduta śāstraṃ nāmeti ||
śāstrād guṇadoṣaviveke sati ko guṇastad......āha—
gaurgauḥ kāmadughā samyakprayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ |
duṣprayuktā punargotvaṃ prayoktaḥ saiva śaṃsati ||6 ||
gaurvāk kāvyādisvabhāvā | samyak śāstrādiprabhāveṇa svarūpato 'rthataśca pariśuddhā
prayuktā kṛtā prakāśitā satī puruṣeṇeti gamyate | kāma[dughā]......riti vakṣyamāṇamatrāpi sambandhanīyam | gauḥ saurabheyī smaryate ām‍nāyate budhairāptaiḥ | evamāptā upadiśanti, tasmādavitathametat | āptopadeśasya pramāṇatva[niścayāt][tadanusaraṇata]śceṣṭasiddhidarśanāt | yā vāgevaṃ kāmadhenurjātā suprayuktā satī saiva nānyā | duṣprayuktā punaḥ śāstravirodhāt svabhāvāśrayavaiguṇyenodbhāvitā tu sato gotvaṃ [paśutvaṃ śaṃ]sati khyāpayati prayoktuḥ puruṣasya | tataścāśāstrajño 'yaṃ puruṣākṛtiḥ paśuriti viduṣāṃ heyaḥ syādityanarthe patitaḥ | dūra evārthasiddhiḥ | tadiha ma[hada]ntaraṃ śāstra[jñānena bhavati | manuṣyatvā][5b]viśeṣe 'pi śāstrajño deva iva pūjyate guṇānurāgibhiritarastu paśuriva dṛśyata iti ||
yata evaṃ sarvatra guṇadoṣavivekaḥ śāstrādeva | guṇaśca puruṣārthena yojayati doṣaśca [itareṇa, ataḥ] śāstrānusāreṇa guṇavat [kāvyamekāntataḥ] puruṣārthasādhanam | doṣastu svalpo 'pi śāstraprabhāvādevāpaneyaḥ | anyathā heyaṃ syāditi prakṛtamanubadhnan āha—
tadalpamapi nopekṣyaṃ kāvyaṃ duṣṭaṃ kathañcana |
syād vapuḥ sundaramapi śvitreṇaikena durbhagam || 7 ||
[duṣṭaṃ kāvyaṃ nope]kṣyaṃ kathañcanetyatrāpi yojyam | kenāpi prakāreṇa nopekṣaṇīyam | sarvathā 'paneyameva śāstradṛṣṭayā | anyathā heyaṃ syāt | tadeva prativastūpamayā sādhayannāhasyādityādi [vapuḥ śarīraṃ sundarama]pi varṇasaṃsthānasampannamapi prāgevāsundaram | ekena śvitreṇa kuṣṭhadoṣeṇa durbhagamaspṛśyaṃ heyaṃ syāt | sundaramapi śarīraṃ kuṣṭena svalpenāpyupa [pannaṃ heyaṃ yathā] tathā kaveḥ kāvyamayaṃ śarīraṃ śāśvataṃ sarvārthasādhanaṃ svalpenāpi śabdarūpeṇārthalakṣaṇena vā doṣeṇa śvitrakalpena pariharaṇīyaṃ syāt | prāgeva......ddhaṃ kāryaṃ karaṇīyam | doṣastu svalpo 'pi pariharaṇīyaḥ śāstradṛṣṭayeti |
kriyata eva nirdoṣaṃ kāvyaṃ vināpi śāstreṇetyāśaṅkya sarvaṃ śāstrādeva guṇadoṣa[parijñānaṃ kartavyami]ti pūrvoktakrameṇārthaṃ prativastūpamayā samarthayannāha—
guṇadoṣānaśāstrajñaḥ kathaṃ vibhajate janaḥ |
kimandhasyādhikāro 'sti rūpabhedopalabdhiṣu || 8 ||
guṇā viśeṣā upādeyā arthāḥ puruṣārthasaṃgṛhītāstadviparītā doṣāḥ |......kāvyāpekṣayā tu śabdārthālaṅkārasvabhāvā guṇāḥ | doṣāstvapārthatvādayaḥ | śleṣaviparyāsādayaśca
vaidarbhamārgāpekṣayā vakṣyamāṇāḥ | ata eva sāmānyenāha—guṇadoṣānaśāstrajñaḥ kathaṃ vibhajate janaḥiti | sarvamapi sā[mānyaṃ e]kasyāpyarthasya prakṛtāpekṣayā viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ bhaviṣyatīti nipuṇeyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ | tān guṇadoṣān yo na vetti puruṣaḥ[sa] kathaṃ vibhajate [vibhaktānkaro]ti ete guṇāḥ [ete doṣā i]ti | ya[to guṇānāda]tte doṣāna hāsyati kathañcit | kiṃ na vibhajate, aśāstrajño yataḥ | śāstrādeva hi guṇadoṣā vivecyante | yaśca śāstraṃ guṇadoṣaviveka[viṣa][6a]yaṃ na vetti, kathaṃ tasyāpratipannopāyasya guṇadoṣavivekalakṣaṇamupeyaṃ setsyati | yathā tvasya rūpava......................kimandhasyetyādi | andhasya cakṣurvikalasya rūpabhedānāṃ nīlapītādīnāṃ rūpaviśeṣāṇāṃ upa[la]bdhiṣu darśane[ṣu nādhiṃkāraḥ | i ]ha sāmānyena rūpaṃ nāma kiñcidastīti śrutimātrakamapaśyataḥ syāt | na tu rūpaviśeṣasākṣātkā[raḥ | viśeṣajñānābhāve] na ca tat kvacidupayujyate | tato yadāhamanuṣṭhānā[?]bhāvād vibhāgena tu sarvātmanā śāstra......[vibha]jata ityāha | tadevamiyatā granthena śāstrādeva sarvaguṇadoṣavivekato nānyathā kāvye 'pi......
ataḥ prajānāṃ vyutpattimabhisandhāya sūrayaḥ |
vācāṃ vicitramārgāṇāṃ nibabandhuḥ kriyāvidhim || 9 ||
ataḥ kāraṇāt sūrayaḥ pūrvācāryāḥ kriyāvidhiṃ nibabandhuriti saṃbandha | kriyāvidhiṃ kriyākalpam.........[malla]nāgenatula॰ — kriyākalpaḥ kāvyakaraṇavidhiḥ kāvyālaṃkāra ityarthaḥ | — kāmasūtra [1. 3 16] jayamaṅgalā — pṛḥ 36. vidyāsamuddeśe kriyākalpa iti kāvyālaṅkāra uktaḥ | tadanusāreṇānena kriyākalpaḥ kriyā .........[vidhī]yate 'neneti kriyāvidhiḥ | kriyākalpo 'pi evamiti nārthataḥ kaścid bhedaḥ | kāvyalakṣaṇaṃ śāstraṃ kṛtavantaḥ | [śāstrānusāreṇa mūrkho] 'pi pravartate | kiṃ punarbuddhimān lokaḥ | tasmāt sarvatra nmatamiti | vyutpattimabhisandhāya kāvye yathāvad guṇadoṣaparijñāna[hetubhiḥ śāstra]saṃgṛhītairguṇadoṣaviveko vyutpattiḥ tadupādānahāniphalā 'bhidheyā | catuvarga iti ca nānāprakāraḥ sarvapuruṣārthaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ | asyaiva tu [śāstrasya prameyaśca]turvargaḥ | tatpratipādakaṃ śāstraṃ tādarthyāt | etāvāneva ca puruṣārthaḥ | tatra sarvatra guṇāśca doṣāśca jñātavyāḥ | tatra guṇā vastutaḥ puruṣārthamayā eva | tatasta upāde[yāḥ] upādeyatayā [ca]jñeyāstathārthenājñātānāmupādānāsambhavāt | doṣāstu tadābhāsāstatsaṃbhavino heyāḥ | te 'pi heyatayā jñeyāstathā bhāvenājñātānāṃ hānāsaṃbhavāt | [6b] [vi]vekaśca samyak ﻿
śāstrādeva dṛṣṭārthādadṛṣṭārthād veti sarvaśāstrasthitireṣā | kāvyamapyetat trividhaṃ catu rvargarūpaṃ caturvargastadupāyaścānena rasāntaraparigraheṇa pratipādya[pratipā]dakatvāt | śabdātmakamapi kāvyaśarīraṃ caturvargastādarthyāt | upāyo 'pi tādarthyāccaturvargaḥ |
mukhyastāvaccaturvargaḥ pumarthāśeṣasaṃgrahaḥ |
tadupāye 'pi tādarthyācchāstreṣvapi [samādaraḥ] ||
iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ |
kiṃ ca kāvyeneṣṭadevatāviṣayavicitrastotralakṣaṇena samyag‌viracitena dharmo 'prameyaḥ | tathātve ca kadācid varalābhādiko 'rthaḥ | sukha[m]pyetatpuruṣārtha[dvaya]niṣṭhamuktam |
buddhastotragranthanavyāpṛtānāṃ bhaktiprahveṣvindriyeṣu dravatsu |
ekaikasmin yaḥ kṣaṇe puṇyakośo nāsarvajñastaṃ pramātuṃ samarthaḥ || iti |
guṇajñarājādi[varṇanātoḥpyaryāti]śayaprāptistadarthācca dharmaḥ sukhaṃ ca sampatsyete | kiṃ bahunā, na so 'sti puruṣārthaḥ kaścid yaḥ kāvyāt parigṛhītāśrayaviśeṣā[nna jāyate | i]hānuṣaṅge guṇadoṣavibhāgaḥ karaṇīyaḥ | sa ca śāstrādeva nānyatheti vistareṇa pūrvameva pratipāditam | tataḥ kā[vyakriyā]vidhimiti prakṛtam | kasya vyutpattimabhisandhāyetyāha-prajānāmiti | lokasya santāne kā vyutpattiḥ kathaṃ [keṣāṃ ?] nāma...... [vyutpādanakri]yāmabhisandhāya kriyāvidhiṃ nibabandhurityāha-vācāṃ vicitramārgāṇāmiti | vicitro nānāprakāraḥ śabdālaṃkārā[rthālaṃkārādiyukto mārgaḥ] kāvyānyeva | tataḥ kāvyaviṣayāṃ lokakartṛkāṃ kāvyaguṇadoṣavibhāgavijñānalakṣaṇāṃ vyutpattimuddiśya [śāstranirmāṇam] | tatsaṃkṣepatvād idamapi saprayojanamiti karttavyameva | tataśca sāmānyena kāvyalakṣaṇaśāstrāj‌jñeya iyatā viśiṣyocyate ||
[kāvyala]kṣaṇamidānīṃ kartumārabhate—
taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānāmalaṅkāraśca darśitaḥ |
śarīraṃ tāvadiṣṭārthavyavacchinnā padāvalī || 10 ||
iha yoni kānicit kāvyāni saṃbhavanti teṣāṃ [śarīramalaṅkāraśca] taiḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ lokasya kāvyavyutpattaye kriyākalpe nibaddhe | tayoḥ kīdṛśaṃ śarīram [śabdarūpam | arthe][7a]nāviṣṭatvāt | yathā hi puruṣaśarīre hārakeyūrādiralaṃkāro nyasyate yena
śobhate, tathā kāvyaśarīre [śabdamaye 'pyupamādirarpya]te, yataḥ śobhā | [va]kṣyate [ca]—kāvyaśobhākarān dharmānalaṃkārān pracakṣate || iti | [2.1] paścādalaṅkāro vakṣyate | padānāṃ subantati[ṅantānāṃ āvalī śreṇī, tayā] paripūrṇaṃ kāvyaṃ [tasya] ślokādayo 'vayavā avāntaravākyāni | kavinā vaktumiṣṭe 'bhiprete 'rthe kasmiṃścid raghuvaṃśādau | vyavacchinnā gamakatve[na]...svīkṛtā | viśeṣe[ṇa]... ......[śarī]raṃ vijñeyamitīṣṭārthavyavacchinnā padāvalī prasiddhatvādanūdyāprasiddhaṃ śarīraṃ vidhīyate | yathā yaḥ.............
[śa]rīraṃ katividhamityāha—
padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca tat tridhaiva vyavasthitam |
padyaṃ catuṣpadī tacca vṛttaṃ jātiriti dvidhā || 11 ||
yadanantaraṃ lakṣaṇataḥ kathitaṃ taccharīraṃ prabhedataḥ tridhaiva triprakārameva vyavasthitaṃ boddhavyam |.........[ke]valapadyātmakaṃ......[kevalagadyātmakaṃ gadyapadyobhayātmakaṃ ca]... ityanekena prakāreṇa tridhaiva vyavasthitamiti prakṛtam | tatra padyaṃ na jñāyate kiṃrūpamityata āha-padyaṃ catuṣpadītyādi |.........anūdya padyamiti jñā[payati catuṣpadī] tat padyaṃ jñeyamiti | tacca padyaṃ dvidhā dviprabhedamavaseyam | katham—vṛttaṃ jātirityanena rūpeṇa ||
tadapi na jñāyate kiṃ vṛttaṃ jāti[rvā kīdṛśī]ti | tadāha—

anyā kathā uktāyā ākhyāyikāyā anyatvāt | nāyakena vācyā yaccaritaprakāśanāya pravṛttā, itareṇa vā nāyakādanyena vā, tatsahāyādinā vācyeti na vaktṛniyamaḥ kathāyām | ayaṃ tāvadanayorbhedaḥ |
na[nviya]mākhyāyikā svayaṃ nāyakenocyate na kathā | evaṃ hi svaguṇodbhāvanaprasaṅgaḥ | taccānucitamabhijātasya | taduktam-svaguṇāviṣkṛtiṃ kuryādabhijātaḥ kathaṃ janaḥ | iti | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1.29]
atrāha—svaguṇāviṣkriyetyādi | ayaṃ tāvadadoṣaḥ | yataḥ svasyātmanaḥ sveṣāṃ vā guṇānāṃ vaṃśasya vīryādīnāmāviṣkriyā prastāvavaśāt kathanaṃ na doṣaḥ na duṣyati | kasya—bhūtaṃ yathāvṛttamarthaṃ svacā[ritrya]lakṣaṇaṃ śaṃsato bruvato nāyakasya | atrākhyāyikāyāṃ kathāyāṃ vā | tena hi yathāvṛttaṃ svacaritamamidheyaṃ doṣarūpaṃ guṇarūpamanyadvā, na viparītam | tat[a]viparītaṃ yathāvṛttamātmanaḥ kathayataḥ prastāvavaśaprāptaṃ svaguṇakathanaṃ kathamābhijātyaṃ hāpayet | pratyuta viparītāmidhāne ābhijātyaṃ hīyeta | ātmava[ñcana]rūpaṃ tu svaguṇāviṣkaraṇamanucitamābhijātye | ﻿
nanu nātra doṣa ityetāvaduktam | guṇastu na kaścit | ayameva guṇo yo doṣābhāvaḥ | tallakṣaṇatvāttasya sarvatreti yat‌tkiñcidetam | a[nena] caitannirastaṃ bhaṅgayā yaduktaṃ bhāmahena, ākhyāyikāyāṃ sukhaduḥkharūpaṃ svacaritaṃ yathāvṛttamākhyāyate nāyakena na tu guṇarūpamiti | vṛttamākhyāyate yasyāṃ nāyakena svaceṣṭa[11a]nāditi |
nanu sāmānyavacanametat | na tvayaṃ viśeṣo dṛśyate duḥkharūpaṃ svacaritaṃ vācyaṃ na guṇarūpamiti | arthādetaduktaṃ tena | yatpaścāt vakṣyati—svaguṇāviṣkṛtiṃ kuryādabhijātaḥ [kāvyālaṅkāre 1.29] iti | anyathā pūrvāparavirodhastatra syāt ||
kiṃ tarhi na yuktamiti svamatamāha—
api tvaniyamo dṛṣṭastatrāpyanyairudīraṇāt |
anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti kīdṛg vā bhedakāraṇam || 25 ||
kiṃ tvidamatra brūmaḥ | yaḥ pareṇa niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva vācyeti, sa nāsti | yatastatrākhyāyikāyāmapi na kevalaṃ kathāyām, aniyamaḥ nāyakenaiva vācyetyasya niyamasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ upalabdhaḥ kṛtaḥ | anyairudīraṇāt nāyakādanyairapi tadanucarādibhirākhyāyikāyā udīraṇāt vacanāt | harṣacaritādikāyāmākhyāyikāyāmanyairapi nāyakacaritakathanadarśanāditi manyate | sarvathā kaviriha vaktā, tanmukhena nāyako vā, svātantryamatra kaveḥ | nanu bhāmahena kathāyāḥ parodīraṇamiṣṭaṃ, yadāha—anyaiḥ svacaritaṃ tasya nāyakena tu noditam | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1.29] iti | tatra kimucyate kathā nāyakenetareṇa vā vācyeti | anuktopālambho 'yam | etadeva siddhaṃ kathāyāmapyaniyamadarśanāt uktena nyāyenobhayathāpyadoṣāt | bhavatu vāyaṃ niyamaḥ ākhyāyikā nāyakenocyate kathā tvanyeneti | tathāpi naitāvatā ākhyāyikākathayorbhinnajātīyatvamiti paramatamabhyupagamyāpi tayorabhedamanyataḥ kathayannāha—anyo vaktetyādi | kathāyāmanyo vaktā, ākhyāyikāyāṃ svayamiti kīdṛk kiṃ nāmedaṃ tayorbhedasya vi[11b]jātīyatvasya kāraṇaṃ nimittam | naivedaṃ jātibhedasya
kāraṇamityarthaḥ | anyathaivaṃvidhasya bhedasya sarvatra sulabhatvāt tāvatā vijātoyatve 'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | vācyaṃ hi dvayamapyetat | tat kenāpyucyatāṃ svayaṃ pareṇa[vā] yathāyogam | kimetāvatā jāterbhedaḥ syāt | arthatastvekaiva jātiriyaṃ nāmamātrāttu bhidyate | yadvakṣyati—ekā jātiḥ saṃjñādvayāṅkitā [1. 28] | evaṃ tarhīdamanayorbhedakāraṇam, yatra vaktrāparavaktrayo padyayorbhaviṣyadarthasūcakayoḥ praveśaḥ sāś‍vāsā ca yā sā ākhyāyikā | tadviparītā katheti | taduktam—vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca kālabhāvyarthaśaṃsi ca | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1. 26] iti | tathā—sāś‍vāsākhyāyikā matā | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1. 25]
na vaktrāparavaktrābhyāṃ yuktā nāś‍vāsavatyapi |
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā ceṣṭā kathā 'pabhraṃśatā tathā || iti || [kāvyālaṅkāre 1. 28]
tadevaṃ tadud‌bhāvya pariharannāha—
vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca sāś‍vāsatvaṃ ca bhedakam |
cihnamākhyāyikāyāścet prasaṅgena kathāsvapi || 26 ||
āryādivat praveśaḥ kiṃ na vaktrāparavaktrayoḥ |
bhedaśca dṛṣṭo lambhādirāś‍vāso vāstu kiṃ tataḥ || 27 ||
vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca padyadvayaṃ sahāś‍vāsena varttate tadbhāvaḥ tattvam | taccaitat trayam ākhyāyikāyāś‍ci‍hnaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhedakaṃ kathāyāḥ sakāśādviśeṣakaṃ cāpyasyāsya kathāyāmabhāvāditicenmanyase, nanu yataḥ [prasaṅgena] tatra gadyādhikārāt prastāvena bhāvyarthasūcanādilakṣaṇena hetubhūtena nādhikāritayā vaktrāparavaktrayoḥ kathāsvapi ākhyāyikāvat kiṃ kasmānna praveśaḥ na prayogaḥ syādevetyarthaḥ | kiṃvat ? āryādivat | ﻿
āryāderiva yathāprastāvamanyasyāpi padyasya na stavādeḥ praveśādigrahaṇam, trayāṇāmapi padyatvenāviśeṣādayamapi niyamo nāstītyarthaḥ | tathāhi yadi tādṛśaḥ prastāvaḥ syāt, tadā kathāsvapi anayoḥ prabhedo na duṣyati, yathā ā[12a]ryādeḥ | ākhyāyikāyāmapi hi prasaṅgena tayoḥ praveśaḥ nādhikāritayā, [tatra] gadyādhikārāt tathā kathāyāmapi iti nedaṃ bhedakamasādhāraṇaṃ ci[ntanīyam | lambha]starhi bhedakaṃ cihnamastu kathāyāṃ tasyābhāvāt | atrāha—bhedaś‍cetyādi | lambhādirbhedo viśeṣaḥ | ādigrahaṇāt yava[?]viśrāmādivyavahāraḥ ākhyāyikāviṣayaḥ [kathāyāma]pi dṛṣṭaḥ | tataścāśvāso 'pi yadi bhavet ko nāmātra doṣaḥ | lambhādirvā bhedo bhavatu, āśvāso vā vyavahāraḥ, kiṃ tataḥ tasmād vyavahāramātrāt, kiṃjātīyatvamanayorbhavet | naivārthabhedaḥ, abhedādityarthaḥ | paricchedā hi tatra sampannāḥ kartavyā itīdamatra tātparyam, vipannānāṃ heyatvāt | te ca lambhādivyapadeśyā vā bhavantu, āśvāsavyavahāryā veti svātantryamatra kaveḥ, viśeṣābhāvāt |
nanu bhāmahakṛto niṣedho 'sti |na vaktrāparavaktrābhyāṃ yukto nāśvāsavatyapi | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1. 28] katheti |
nanu daṇḍikṛto vidhirasti, lambhādirvāśvāso vā bhavatviti | tadapramāṇamiti cet | bhāmahakṛto niṣedhaḥ pramāṇamiti kośapānamatra karaṇīyaṃ syāt | dvayorapi śāstrakāratvāt prāmāṇyam, na vā kasyāpi | matabhedastatra bhavatviti cet ? astu tatkimasthānābhiniveśaḥ kriyate | yuktipuraskṛtaṃ tu daṇḍimataṃ dṛśyata iti ||
tatkathākhyāyiketyekā jātiḥ saṃjñādvayāṅkitā |
atraivāntarbhaviṣyanti śeṣāścākhyānajātayaḥ || 28 ||
yata evaṃ nirūpyamāṇo nānayoḥ kaścijjātibhedo labhyate anyatra saṃjñābhedāt, tatastāvadekā jātiriyaṃ gadyajātiḥ | ākhyāyikeyaṃ katheyamiti anena saṃjñādvayena dvābhyāṃ nāmabhyāma[12b]ṅkitā lakṣitā vyavaharaṇīyā | na ca nāmabhedamātrakena jātibheda eva sarvathā syāt | brāhmaṇakṣatriyādibhede 'pi manuṣyatvātteṣām | kriyābhedo 'tra
saṃjñābhedanimittamiti cet—kiṃ vai sarvā naimittikī saṃjñā, yādṛcchikyapi hi sā dṛśyate, maṇḍapādivat | nimittaṃ vā kiṃcinmṛgyatāṃ yadi tena vinā dauḥsthyam | nanvapare 'pi gadyaprabhedā dṛśyante, kiṃ te noktā iti cedāha—atraivetyādi | śeṣāṃ ākhyānaparyāyā ye sambhavanti ākhyānajātayaḥ, ākhyānakaprabhedāḥ tā atraivānayoreva kathākhyāyikayorantarbhaviṣyanti gadyajātitvenābhedāt lakṣaṇataḥ | cakāraḥ [an]uktasamuccaye | tasmāt pṛthak tāsāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ noktam | tallakṣaṇenaiva kṛtalakṣaṇatvādityartha iti ||
ayaṃ tarhi viśeṣa ākhyāyikāyāḥ | sā hi—kanyāharaṇasaṃgrāmavipralambhodayānvitā | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1. 27] ākhyāyikā na katheti bhāmahaḥ | tatrāha—
kanyāharaṇasaṃgrāmavipralambhodayādayaḥ |
sargabandhasamā eva na te vaiśeṣikā guṇāḥ || 29 ||
kanyāyā haraṇaṃ saṃgrāmastannimitto 'nyo vā, vipralambho viyogaḥ, udayo 'bhyudayaḥ ripuvijayādilakṣaṇaḥ | ādiśabdena mattatāsuratotsavādiparigrahaḥ | nanu bhāmahena tāvaduktam—kanyāharaṇasaṃgrāmavipralambhodayānvitā | iti | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1. 27] tatkimapi sūcyate | evaṃ manyate | so 'pi niyamo [nāpo]hyate, adhikadarśanāt | upalakṣaṇaṃ vā tadvacanaṃ, te 'pi guṇāḥ [a]tha na vaiśeṣikāḥ, kathāyāḥ sakāśādākhyāyikāṃ na bhedayantītyarthaḥ | viśeṣā [bhe]dāḥ [yaiḥ] kathyante ākhyāyikāyāḥ, prayojanameṣāmiti vaiśeṣikāstathā na bhavantītyarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | yataḥ sargabandhe 'pi samānāḥ | sā[dhāraṇāḥ, teṣāṃ ta]trāpi darśanāt | tad yadi [kathā](13a)yāmapi yathāprastāvaṃ bhavanti ko niṣeddhā | bhāmaha iti cet | uktamatra, kiṃ carvitacarvaṇena | dṛśyante ca kathāyāṃ līlāvatītyādikāyāmapi te 'rthāstatkathaṃ bhintsyate ākhyāyikāṃ kathāta iti ||
﻿
yatra tarhi kaverabhiprāyeṇa kathanamaṅkanaṃ kiñcid dṛśyate sā ākhyāyikā tadanyā katheti bhāmahaḥ |kaverabhiprāyakṛtairaṅkanaiḥ kaiścidaṅkitā iti | [kāvyālaṅkāre 1. 27] tadetadubhayaṃ pariharannāha—
kavibhāvakṛtaṃ cihnamanyatrāpi na duṣyati |
mukhamiṣṭārthasaṃsiddhau kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām || 30 ||
kaveḥ prayokturbhāvenābhiprāyeṇa kṛtaṃ prayuktaṃ cihnamaṅkanam anyatrāpi kathāyāmapi sargabandhe 'pi vā, na kevalamākhyāyikāyām na duṣyati na doṣāya kalpate niṣedhābhāvāt |
nanu niṣiddhameva [tad] bhāmahena kathāyām, ākhyāyikāmeva kabibhāvakṛtacihnavidhānāt | uktamatra | tenāpi ca niyamo na kṛtaḥ kācidaṅkiteti vacanāt | tasmādidamapi sargabandhādisādhāraṇaṃ na samarthayati kathāta ākhyāyikāyā bhedam | kirātādau ca lakṣmyā grahaṇādikaṃ kavibhāvakṛtaṃ cihnaṃ dṛśyate, syādetat ākhyāyikāyāmiti | tadasat | yasmānmusvamiṣṭārthasaṃsiddhau kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām | kṛtaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ vyutpanna ātmā cittaṃ yeṣāṃ, kṛtātmanāṃ sudhiyām | iṣṭasyārthasya svanāmāṅkanāderanyenāpadeśena vidagdhena krameṇa kiṃ nāma mukhamupāyo na syāt | sarvameva hi teṣāmiṣṭasiddhidvārībhavati kauśalaviśeṣāt | tasmād yadīcchanti kathāyāmanyatra vā sarvatredṛśaṃ kartumupāyajñāste [ku]rvantyeva, na cet na kvacidapīti | nedamapi bhedakaṃ cihnam | tasmā[13b]detadeva sthitam—tatkathākhyāyiketyekā jātiḥ saṃjñādvayāṅkitā iti | [1.28] syādetat, ākhyāyikā saṃskṛtenaiva dṛśyate | ākhyāyikāpi bhāṣāntareṇa dṛśyate, asaṃskṛtāpekṣayeti | kiṃ na kathā | atha saṃskṛtāpekṣayā bhāṣāntareṇa [na] dṛśyate ākhyāyikā sarvasaṃskṛtā kathāpyevamiti mābhūt kathā | atha miśrāpi kathā dṛśyate nākhyāyikā | tathā amiśrā sarvasaṃskṛtā sākhyāyikā syāt, kādambaryādivat |
kathaṃ tarhi ākhyāyiketi vyapadiśyate iti cet | ata evaṃ saṃjñādvayāṅkitā ekā jātirityuktam | jātibhedo 'tra niṣidhyate, na saṃjñābhedaḥ | evaṃ kathāviśeṣaḥ ākhyāyikā syāt, na jātibhedaḥ | yathā kathāviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃjñābhedā yatheṣṭam | na ca bhāṣābheda—mātrādvijātīyatvam | kathānāmapi parasparavijātīyatvaprasaṅgāt etāvantaḥ syāt | kācit kathā saṃskṛtamayī | kācit prākṛtamayī | kācit apabhraṃśasvabhāvā | kācit bhūtabhāṣāmayī | kācit miśreti | yathā vācāṃ bhāṣābhede 'pi na kathātvaṃ hīyate gadyamayatvāt, prasaṅge tu padyapraveśaḥ, tathā saṃskṛtamayyā ākhyāyikāyāḥ kathātvaṃ na viruddhayate | ata evoktam | ekā jātiḥ kathājātireva yatheṣṭaṃ saṃjñā anubhavati, yathā manuṣyajātirekā kṣatriya jātisaṃjñām | bhāṣāntaramayīnāmapi kathānāṃ gadyenārthopakṣepaḥ lambhādiparicchedādau na dūṣyate niṣedhābhāvāt | bhāmahena niṣiddhamiti cet | daṇḍinā vihitamiti kiṃ na pratyeṣi | tasmāt kācit kathā [āśvāsādau] gadyākṣiptārthā, kācinna | [na]hyetāvatā ākhyāyikā kathātvaṃ nānubhavati | kathā vā ' 'khyāyikā[14a]saṃjñāmityekaiva jātiḥ saṃjñādvayāṅkiteti sūktameva ||
tadevaṃ lakṣaṇataḥ [praci]nvan kathāṃ, āśvāsādibhedaṃ ca gadyaṃ nirdiśya, tṛtīyaṃ miśrakāvye śarīramadhikṛtyāha—
miśrāṇi nāṭakādīni teṣāmanyatra vistaraḥ |
gadyapadyamayī kāpi campūrityabhidhīyate || 31 ||
nāṭakamādiryeṣām prakaraṇādīnāṃ tāni nāṭakādīni kāvyānītyatra miśrāṇi gadyapadyamayāni veditavyāni iti miśravidhiḥ | nanu kathādikamapi miśraṃ tatrāpi padyapraveśāt | prasaṅgena tatra padyapraveśaḥ, nādhikāritayā | ataevoktaṃ prasaṅgena kathāsvapīti [1.26] | nāṭakādiṣūbhayamapi adhikṛtamiti nāṭakānyeva miśrāṇi | kimeṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaprabhedo vetyata āha—teṣāmityādi | teṣāṃ nāṭakādīnāṃ miśrāṇāṃ miśraprabandhānāmanyatra bharatakohalādau nāṭyaśāstre vistaraḥ nāndīprarocanādisvarūpanirūpaṇādirūpaḥ prapañco 'dhikṛto neha | tatastato 'sau draṣṭavyaḥ | gadyapadyaprabandhastviha vistarato 'dhikṛtaḥ | sa coktaḥ | kiṃ nāṭakādikameva miśraṃ netyāha—gadyapadyetyādi | gadyapadyayovikāraḥ gadyapadyamayī miśrā campūrityapekṣya strītvam | yadāha campūriti | campūrnāma vidyate | kāpi kācidityasākalya[m] | apiśabdo na kevalaṃ pūrvakamiti samuccinoti | ayamapi
miśraprakāro 'sti | yadvaccampūriti yāvat | sā ca jātakamālādamayantyādi ||
tadevaṃ śarīrabhedakṛtaṃ traividhyaṃ kāvyānāṃ parisamāpya bhāṣābhedakṛtaṃ cāturvidhyaṃ darśayannāha—
tadidaṃ vāṅmayaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā |
apabhraṃśaśca miśraṃ cetyāhurāptāścaturvidham || 32 ||
yat kāvyaśarīraṃ trividhamuktaṃ tadidaṃ vāṅmayaṃ kāvyaśarīraṃ bhūyaḥ punaścatvāro vidhāḥ prakārā bhāṣāmayā yasya [14b] tat pratyekaṃ caturvidhamāhurāmananti | āptā ācāryāḥ | kathaṃ—padyaṃ kāvyaśarīraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ śuddham, prākṛtaṃ śuddham, apabhraṃśaḥ śuddhaḥ, miśraṃ ca taiḥ paiśācikena cāśuddhyadhikā tu pṛthaguktā | [yathā] paścādvakṣyati, bhūtabhāṣāmayīmityādinā | evaṃ gadyaṃ miśraṃ ca kāvyaśarīraṃ yojyam | pūrvaṃ gadyapadyābhyāṃ miśramuktamidānīṃ saṃskṛtaprākṛtāpabhraṃśaiḥ pratyekaṃ trividhaṃ śarīraṃ miśramuktāmiti miśrayorbheda iti ||
saṃskṛtādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ pratipādayannāha,
saṃskṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāganvākhyātā maharṣibhiḥ |
tadbhavaṃ tatsamaṃ deśītyanekaḥ prākṛtakramaḥ || 33 ||
devānāmiyaṃ daivī vāk bhāṣā saṃskṛtamiti vijñāyate | yadyevaṃ kathamiha saṃskṛtaṃ jñātamiti cedāha—anvākhyātā maharṣibhiriti mahadbhirudāttairguṇamāhātmyāt ṛṣibhirmunibhirdeśabhāṣāvadbhiranvākhyātā anuśiṣṭā satīha saṃskṛtamiti jñātetyarthaḥ | tataścaikaprakāraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ, prākṛtaṃ tvanekaprakāram | yadāha, tadbhavamityādi | prākṛtasya kramaḥ prakāraḥ aneko bhinnaḥ kathaṃ tadbhavaṃ tasmāt saṃskṛtāt varṇānyatvena utpattiryasya tattadbhavaṃ śabdabhavamityarthaḥ | tacca mahindasindhavabahirādikaṃ yathoktaṃ harivṛddhena | tatsamam tena saṃskṛtena samaṃ tatsamam, prākṛtaśabdamapītyarthaḥ | tacca hariharakamalādikaṃ yathoktaṃ tatraiva | deśī prākṛtaṃ mahārāṣṭraprasiddham | taduktam—
marahaṭṭhādesasaṃketaehi saddehi bhaṇṇae desī iti |
tacca vokkaṇakaṃ kellicirihirahirasicchādikam |
yathoktaṃ tatraiva | ityevamanena rūpeṇānekaḥ prākṛtakrama iti ||
kimatrotkṛṣṭaṃ prākṛtamityāha— ﻿
mahārāṣṭrāyāṃ bhāṣāṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ prākṛtaṃ viduḥ |
sāgaraḥ sūktaratnānāṃ setubandhādi yanmayam || 34 ||

iti | kutraitad dṛśyate iti cedāha-sāgara ityādi | setubandhaḥ pravarasenaracitaḥ | skandhakamaryaḥ ādiryasya mathanādestatsetubandhādi kāvyam yanmayaṃ yasya prākṛtasya vikāraḥ, tatprākṛtaṃ prakṛṣṭamiti prakṛtam | tatkāvyaṃ saditi praśaṃsayannāha—sāgaraḥ sūktaratnānāmiti | sūktāni śabdārthotkarṣayogāt | tānyeva prītikaratvādisādharmyeṇa ratnāni, teṣāṃ sāgara āspadam | ratnānāṃ hi sāgara āśrayaḥ, sūktānāṃ ca ratnakalpānāṃ tatkāvyamāśraya iti sāgara ukta iti | nanu prākṛtāntaramayamapi setubandhādi, tat kimucyate mahārāṣṭraprākṛtamayamiti | na cātra paṭhyate mahārāṣṭraprākṛtamayameveti | prādhānyāttat tanmayamuktam | yathā hayamayamanīkamiti tatennaśyata(?) ityevaṃparametat ||

aṇṇehi a eehi a sarisaṃ ca a hoi sāmaṇṇe iti |
anyo 'stītyāha—

sāmaṇṇayā aï sahi āyā aaya itarāṇi āu || iti |[?]
vistarastu tacchāstrāt ||
apabhraṃśaḥ katama ityāha—
ābhīrādigiraḥ kāvyeṣvapabhraṃśa iti smṛtāḥ |

ābhīrā vāhikāḥ | ādiśabdena ḍhakkādiparigrahaḥ | teṣāṃ giro bhāṣā apabhraṃśa iti, apabhraṃśanām‍nā vyapadiśyanta iti sthitirvyavasthā | kutretyāha—kāvyeṣu gadyapadyamiśrātmakeṣu kaviprayogeṣu | apabhraṃśo 'pi prākṛtavaccaturdhā smaryate | yaduktam—
śabdabhavaṃ śabdasamaṃ deśīyaṃ sarvaśabdasāmānyam |
prākṛtavadapabhraṃśaṃ jānīhi caturvidhamāhitam || iti
tridhāpyām‍nāyate | yathoktam—aparaṃ triprakāratvaṃ śāstrasthityā prākṛtamapabhraṃśaḥ paiśācikaṃ ceti ||
saṃskṛtaṃ vāṅmayaṃ katamaditi sarvaṃ darśayannāha—
saṃskṛtaṃ sargabandhādi prākṛtaṃ skandhakādi yat |
osarādirapabhraṃśo nāṭakādi tu miśrakam || 37 ||
yat sargabandhādi tatsarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vāṅmayaṃ veditavyam | ādiśabdena pṛthak saṃghātādiparigrahaḥ | yat skandhakādivāṅmayaṃ tatsarvaṃ prākṛtaṃ veditavyam | atrāpi ādiśabdena gāvyādyupādānaṃ setubandhādivad draṣṭavyam | hesarādīti ādarśeosarādīni kāvyāni yāni tāni sarvā[ṇya]pabhraṃśo vijñāyatām | tāni valayakarambakādīni | ādiśabdena rāsakādiparigrahaḥ | nāṭakādi tu yattat miśrakaṃ saṃskṛtādibhirveditavyam | ādiśabdena bhāṇakādiparigrahaḥ ||

kathā ādiryasyākhyānakādeḥ sa kathādiḥ prabandhaḥ | sarvābhirbhāṣābhiḥ saṃskṛtaprākṛtāpabhraṃśapaiśācikā[di]bhiḥ | samuccayavikalpābhyāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ [16a]paṭhyate viracyate | saṃskṛtena ceti gatārthamapi pṛthaguktam | prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ na tu kevalārtham, prākṛtāderatrātipṛthagabhidhānaprasaṅgāt | yathā saṃskṛtaprākṛtāpabhraṃśākhyaṃ bhāṣātrayaṃ śuddhamapi prayuktaṃ dṛśyate, na tathā paiśācikam | bhāṣānugatameva tu dṛśyate cedāha | bhūtabhāṣāmayītyādi | bhūtabhāṣā paiśācikavāk tadvikārastanmayīṃ śuddhapaiśācikām | tuśabdo 'rthāntaravivakṣāyām | bṛhatkathāmāhuḥ kathayanti tadvidaḥ | kevalapaiśācikī bṛhatkathā dṛśyate ityarthaḥ | kiṃviśiṣṭāmityāha—adbhutārthāmiti | adbhutaḥ prakṛṣṭo nānāvidhaḥ apūrvaḥ artho 'bhidheyaṃ yasyāṃ tāmāhuriti prakṛtaṃ pradhānakathanaṃ caitat | ataevādbhutārthāmiti | na tvayameva, anyasyā api bhūtabhāṣāmayyā rat‍naprabhādikāyā darśanāt ||
yadetattrividhaṃ kāvyaśarīraṃ bhāṣābhedāccaturvidhamuktam, tadeva dvidhāviniyogabhedād darśayannāha—
lāsyacchalinaśamyādi prekṣārthamitaratpunaḥ |
śravyameveti saiṣāpi dvayī gatirudāhṛtā || 39 ||
lāsyaṃ śrṛṅgārapradhānaṃ nṛttam | taduktam—
tāṇḍavamaśak‍nuvatyā narttitamāviddhakaraṇasaṃkīrṇam |
priyakāriṇā priyāyā hareṇa lāsyaṃ purā sṛṣṭam || iti |
chalinaṃ [chadma]pradhānaṃ nṛttam | lasyā tālaviśeṣaprādhānyam | sā ca dakṣiṇapāṇipātalakṣaṇā | yathoktam—
savyahastanipātaśca [la]syā tālastu vāmakaḥ |
karayorubhayoḥ pātaḥ sannipāta iti smṛtaḥ ||
tatpratipādakaṃ kāvyaṃ lāsyādyaktaṃ tādarthyāt | ādiśabdena ca skandhakādi-﻿
parigrahaḥ | tadetat prekṣārtham | prekṣā prekṣaṇaṃ cakṣuṣā grahaṇam | tasyai idaṃ prekṣaivārthaḥ prayojanaṃ tadālambya pravṛttiryasya tat prekṣārtham | prekṣā tadarthasyābhinayapradhānatvāt prekṣaṇe viniyujyate, tatśrava[16b]ṇaṃ tu sadapi na vivakṣitam | tasmāllāsyāderitarat anyat sargabandhādi śravyameva śravaṇa eva viniyujyate, anabhineyārthatvāt, na prekṣaṇe iti | saiṣā evaṃ rūpā dvayī dvividhā gatirvyavasthā viniyogakṛtā udāhṛtā kathitā | tasya trividhasya kāvyasya na kevalaṃ caturvidhetyapi śabdaḥ | yaduktam—taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānāmalaṅkāraśca darśitaḥ [1.10] iti | tatreyatā śarīramalaṅkārādhiṣṭhānaṃ nirdiṣṭam ||
idānīmalaṅkāraṃ tasya nirdidikṣuḥ prasthānaṃ racayannāha—
astyaneko girāṃ mārgaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparam |
tatra vaidarbhagauḍīyau varṇyete prasphuṭāntarau || 40 ||
girāṃ kāvyānāṃ mārgo racanāprakāraḥ, aneko bhinno vijātīyaḥ udīcyādidigdeśabhedena asti pravarttate | kimekāntavisadṛśo 'sau, netyāha—sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparamiti | parasparamanyo yam sūkṣmaḥ svalpaḥ bhedo 'ntaraṃ yasya sa tathā | vijātīyatve 'pi sadṛśo 'sti mārgaḥ, gogavayādivadityutsargaḥ | tasyāpavādamāha—tatretyādi | tatra tasminnanekasmin mārge vaidarbhagauḍīyau prasphuṭāntarau | vidarbhā dākṣiṇātyāḥ, ekadeśena samudāyopalakṣaṇatvāt | teṣāmayaṃ vaidarbhaḥ | gauḍāḥ paurastyāḥ teṣāmayaṃ gauḍīyaḥ | tau mārgau prasphuṭau | mahadantaraṃ bhedo 'nayoriti prasphuṭāntarau | vijātīyatve 'pi śeṣo mārgo vaidarbheṇa sadṛśaḥ, gaveva gavayaḥ | gauḍīyastu visadṛśaḥ | gaveva karabhaḥ | vyaktibhedastvekaikasyāmapyanantaḥ pratikavisthitaḥ sa iha na vivakṣitaḥ | tad vakṣyati—tad‌bhedāstu na śakyante vak‍tuṃ pratikavisthitāḥ | iti | [1.101]

vaidarbhamanyadastīti manyante sudhiyo 'pare |
tadeva ca kila jyāyaḥ sadarthamapi nāparam ||
gauḍīyamidametattu vaidarbhamiti kiṃ pṛthak |
gatānugatikanyāyānnānākhyeyamamedhasām || [kāvyālaṅkāre 1.31-32] iti, tad bhaṅgyā nirastam | tathāhi—kaścitkāvyaracanāprakāraḥ śabdālaṃkāralakṣaṇo dākṣiṇātyānāṃ nijo vaidarbhamārga iti vyavahriyate, yathā yānaviśeṣo dakṣiṇamārga iti | tadviparītastu paurastyānāṃ kāvyaracanāprakāro gauḍīya iti vyapadiśyate | yathā dakṣiṇamārgavilakṣaṇo yānaprakāra uttaramārga iti | tataśca vāstavīyaṃ nānātā kathamamedhasām | yā hi bhrāntikṛtā sā bhavedamedhasāṃ viparītadṛśām, yathaikasminna[pi] candramasi | iyaṃ tu sumedhasāmapi, viparītadṛśāmeva, vastubhedakṛtatvāt sū[ryā]candramasoriva | tasmāt svabhāvata eva vilakṣaṇāvetau mārgau | yadvakṣyati—iti mārgadvayaṃ bhinnaṃ tatsvarūpanirūpaṇāt | iti | [1. 101]
atha mataṃ kathaṃ tarhi paurastyeṣu vaidarbho dṛśyate padyasādhāraṇo yathā dākṣiṇātyānāmeva | dākṣiṇātyeṣu vā gauḍīya iti | tatkimetāvatā teṣāmasau nijaḥ syāt | teṣvasau dṛśyamāno 'pi na nijaḥ dakṣiṇamārgavat, yathā dākṣiṇātyānām | nahi candanaṃ deśāntare dṛśyata iti tajjameva syāt | deśāntaradṛṣṭamapi hi malayajameva tat | tathā vaidarbhaḥ paurastyeṣu kathañcit dṛśyamāno 'pi vaidarbha eva, yo dākṣiṇātyānāṃ sahajaḥ | gauḍīyo 'pi dākṣiṇātyeṣu kathañcid dṛśyate tathāpi paurastyānāmevāsau nijatvāt | tadetau kāvyaracanāprakārau mārgau prakṛtivilakṣaṇo dakṣiṇātyairgauḍaiśca vyapadiśye[17b]te | nijatvād deśabhāṣādivat vaidarbhagauḍīya iti | etāvattu syāt |

ityevaṃrūpā daśa guṇāḥ śabdālaṅkārasvabhāvāḥ prāṇāḥ jīvitaṃ smṛtā dṛśyanta iti yāvat | kasya vaidarbhamārgasya dākṣiṇātyakāvyapaddhateḥ sambandhinaḥ | tairhi vaidarbhamārgaḥ kāvyaśarīraṃ prāṇiti | tadabhāve tvasanneva | tataśca śabdālaṅkārabhūtaḥ ś‍leṣādidaśaguṇātmakaḥ kāvyaracanāviśeṣo dākṣiṇātyānāṃ svābhāviko vaidarbhamārga ityarthaḥ sampadyate | evaṃrūpastāvada‌vaidarbhamārgaḥ | gauḍīyaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ, tada‌‌viparītasvabhāva iti darśayannāha—eṣāmityādi | eṣāṃ ś‍leṣādīnāṃ viparyayo vipakṣo 'ś‍leṣādiḥ lakṣyate dṛśyate, kutra ? gauḍānāṃ vartmani kāvye | arthavyaktyā deḥ kasyacid guṇasya sādhāraṇatvāt prāya ityāha | bāhulyenetyarthaḥ | prāyograhaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ sādhāraṇaguṇaṃ svayameva yathāvasaraṃ darśayiṣyati | svābhāvikasteṣāmeṣā raca[18a]nāprakāraḥ | vaidarbhastu kṛtrimo bhavanetyādarśekṛtrimabhāvena bhavediti bhāvaḥ ||

vyutpannamiti gauḍīyairnātirūḍhamapīṣyate |
yathānatyarjunābjanmasadṛkṣāṅa‍ko balakṣaguḥ || 46 ||
gauḍīyaiḥ paurastyairnātirūḍhamapi atirūḍhamatyantaprasiddhārtham | tadviparītaṃ nātirūḍhamatyantāprasiddhārthamapi | na kevalamaprasiddhamityapiśabdaḥ | aprasiddhārthamiṣyata eva | yadyapi atiśayenāpya prasiddhārthaṃ gūḍha़āmidheyamaprasannataraṃ tadapīṣyate ityarthaḥ | kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prasannaṃ parityajya aprasannamiṣyato niṣkāraṇametanna sambhāvyata iti cedāha—vyutpannamiti kṛtvā prasiddhaṃ sukaramevāyatne[nā]pūrvaśabdakalpanayā vyutpannaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tad vyutpannamanyai retādiṣyate itīdamatra kāraṇam | yathetyudāharati | valakṣāḥ śuklā
gāvo raśmayo yasya sa valakṣaguścandraḥ atyarjunaṃ [ati]śuklaṃ [na] tathā 'natyarjunaṃ nīlam apsu janma yasya tadabjanma tacca nīlasannidhānānnīlotpalam | tena sadṛkṣaḥ samānaḥ [aṅa‍kaḥ] cihnaṃ yasya saḥ | tathā nīlotpalasamānacihnaścandra ityetāvatyarthe iyatī vyutpattiḥ kṛteti vyutpannā gauḍā iti ||
samatvaṃ nirdeśayannāha—
samaṃ bandheṣvaviṣamaṃ te mṛdusphuṭamadhyamāḥ |
bandhā mṛdusphuṭonmiśravarṇavinyāsonayaḥ || 47 ||
bandheṣu racanāsu viṣaye yadaviṣamam samam ādimadhyānteṣu caturṇāmapi pādānāṃ sajātīyabandhatvādityanūdya tatsamaṃ kāvyaṃ jñeyamiti vidhīyate | kiyantaste bandhā yeṣvaviṣamaṃ samaṃ syāditi cedāha—ta ityādi | te bandhā mṛdusphuṭamadhyamāḥ trayaḥ sambhavanti | mṛduraśithilaḥ komalaḥ | śithilakomalasya ś‍leṣaviparyayatvāt | yathoktaṃ prāk | mṛduśrutiriti yāvat | sphuṭo 'dhimātraśrutiḥ | kruddhodyasya sukumāraviparyayatvāt | yad vakṣyati—nyakṣeṇetyādi [1. 72] [19b] unmiśro madhyamaśrutiḥ | kaḥ punareṣāṃ prabhava ityāha—mṛdvityādi | mṛdavo mṛduśrutayaḥ kakārādayaḥ yathāsambhavam | sphuṭā adhimātraśrutayaḥ ghakārādayaḥ | unmiśrā mṛdusphuṭāḥ saṃsṛṣṭā ye varṇāsteṣāṃ vinyāso racanā yoniḥ prabhavo yeṣāṃ te tathā | te ca trayaḥ mṛdumadhyo 'dhimātrabhedena pratyekaṃ tridhā sambhavanti | sa[me] tu teṣāmevā[vā]ntaro bhedaḥ syāt | maulāstraya eva bandhāḥ | tatra padyaṃ gadyaṃ dvidhā | yadyekena bandhena samāpyate tadāpadyaikena bandhina samādhyate tathā ityākare | samaṃ kāvyam, vijātīyabandhakṛtavaiṣamyābhāvāt | ata evoktaṃ bandheṣvaviṣamamiti | sāmyaṃ pṛthagudāhṛtam ||
atha vijātīyabandhatvasaṅa‍karastadā viṣamaṃ kāvyaṃ jāyate vijātīyabandhakṛtavaiṣamyayogāt | tadevamudāharannāha—
kokilālāpavācālo māmeti malayānilaḥ |
ucchalacchīkarācchācchanirbhpharāmbhaḥkaṇokṣitaḥ || 48 ||
kokilānāmālāpaiḥ kūjitairvācālo mukharo mṛduvasante kokilālāpasya malayānilasya ca sambhavādevamuktam | ucchalantaḥ śīkarā yeṣāṃ vikīryamāṇakaṇānāmaccha-﻿
cchānāmatyantaprasannānāṃ nirbhpharāṇāṃ praśravaṇānāmambhasa udakasya kaṇaiḥ bindubhirukṣitaḥ siktaḥ śītaḥ malayānilo dakṣiṇamārutaḥ māmeti [mā]mupasarpatīti yojyam | etad‌dvaye mṛdusphuṭavijātīyavarṇasaṅa‍karād viṣamam | etadeva ca [vi]jātīyabandhapūritamarddhadvayaṃ kevalamṛdubandhaṃ kevalasphuṭabandhaṃ ca ś‍lokadvitayaṃ bhavat samodāharaṇaṃ sampadyate | tadyathā—
kokilālāpavācālo māmeti malayānilaḥ |
ājñāmuddāmakāmasya kālasya kathayanniva ||
bibhartti bhrāntimudbhūto bhramarāṇāṃ prabhañjanaḥ |
ucchalacchīkarācchācchanirbhpharāmbhaḥkaṇokṣitaḥ ||
[kāraṇenā][ne]naivāryeṇa daṇḍinā pṛthaṅ nodāhṛtam ||
[20a] yattarhi pāde vijātīyavattvaṃ saṃkīrṇaṃ tadaviṣamamiti kaścit manyate tanniṣedhārthaṃ pādamātreṇāpi viṣamamudāharannāha—
candanapraṇayodgandhirmando malayamārutaḥ |
spardhate ruddhamaddhairyo vararāmāmukhānilaiḥ || 49 ||
candanānāṃ tarūṇāṃ praṇayaḥ paricayaḥ sādeśyāt | tatastenodgandhiḥ udgato gandho 'syeti candanaganvagarbhaḥ surabhiḥ śiśiro 'pi vā | nirastaṃ samādhiṃnirvikāratvaṃ yenopanītamanmathavikāratvāt sa mando mṛdurmalayamāruto dakṣiṇapavanaḥ | [vararāmāmukhānilai]ruttamastrīvadanaś‍vasanaiḥ saha sparddhate [tān] nigṛhṇāti surabhitayā mṛdutvena [ruddha]maddhairyatayā ca sāmyāt | sparddhāyāśca samānaviṣayatvāt tairupamīyata iti yāvat | atra tṛtīyapādena sphuṭatvena vijātīyena madhyamabandhaṃ pādatrayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭamiti viṣamamevedṛśam | etadeva sajātīyaikapādapraveśe samaṃ jāyate | tadyathā—
candanapraṇayodgandhirmando malayamārutaḥ |
spardhate manmathakṣībavararāmāmukhānilaiḥ || iti |
tadetad gauḍīyaṃ nigamayannāha—
ityanālocya vaiṣamyamarthālaṅa‍kāraḍambarau |
avekṣamāṇā vavṛte paurastyā kāvyapaddhatiḥ || 50 ||
﻿
itīdṛśaṃ vaiṣamyamasāmyaṃ vijātīyabandhasaṃkaralakṣaṇam anālocya adṛṣṭvāasvīkṛtyeti yāvat | kāvyapaddhatiḥ kāvyaracanā vavṛte pravarttate | kālasyehānantatvādadyāpi pravṛtteḥ | katamā paurastyā | puraḥ śabdena pūrvasyāṃ diśi deśe vā vyavasthito jana uktaḥ | tasmāttatra bhavā [paurastyā] | gauḍīyeti yāvat | bandhaviṣamamevaṃvidhaṃ kāvyaṃ gauḍa़āḥ kurvanti | na dākṣiṇātyā ityarthaḥ | kastarhitvayā kāvyapakṣaḥ svīkṛto yena kāvyapaddhatiriti yaducyata iti cedāha—arthālaṅa‍kāro jātyādi[20b]lakṣaṇaḥ ḍambaro 'kṣaraḍambaraḥ | 'gauḍeṣvakṣaraḍambara' iti | tāvubhau [avekṣa]māṇā svīkurvatī vavṛte iti prakṛtam | dvayametat gauḍa़vartmani dṛśyate | śabdālaṅa‍kārastu bandhasāmyalakṣaṇo nekṣata ityarthaḥ | ete ca bandhāstrayo 'pi yathāvasaraṃ viniyuktāḥ śobhāmā[ta]nvantīti dākṣiṇātyairiṣyata eva |
kecittu vyācakṣate—unmiśra ekaiko bandho dākṣiṇātyairiṣyate | na tu mṛduḥ sphuṭaśca śaithilyakṛcchrodyatvābhyāṃ duṣṭatvāditi | tadasat, mṛdubandhasyāpyaśithilasya sphuṭabandhasyāpi vā kṛcchrodyasya raghuvaṃśajātakamālādau dākṣiṇātyamahākavikāvyeṣu darśanāt | tadyathā—
tāmbūlavallīpariṇaddhapūgāsvelālatāli[ṅgi]tacandanāsu |
tamālapatrāstara[ṇā]su rantuṃ kaccinmanaste malayasthalīṣu || [raghuvaṃśe 6. 64]
samīkṣyamāṇakṣatajaḥ kṣitīśaḥ kṣapācarairhemavapuścakāśe |
sandhyābhitāmrairjalabhāranamraiḥ payodharairmerurivopagūḍhaḥ || iti | [jātakamālāyām 8.41]
etacca daṇḍināpyatyantasaṃrādhitamiti śrūyate | api ca kiyadiha vaktuṃ śakyate | sarvameva hi vaidarbhakāvyaṃ bandhatrayātmakamupalabhyate | tadanena vyākhyānena avaidarbhaḥ prasajyeta | nacaivam | dṛṣṭavirodhāt | tadana[va]gāhitagranthakārābhiprāyasyaitat vyākhyā[na]miti pratīmaḥ | tasmāttrayo 'pi bandhā yathāvasaramiṣyante dākṣiṇātyaiḥ, bandhavai[ṣa]myameva tu tairbahu manyate |
yatpunaḥ—bandhaśaithilyadoṣastu darśitaḥ sa[rva]komala iti | [1.69] ﻿
yacca kṛcchrodyaṃ nyakṣeṇetyādi [1.72] tatsukumārāvasare cintitam | bandhaśaithilyakaro 'nuprāsaḥ, dīptamiti ca kṛcchrodyaṃ gauḍairbadhyate, na vaidarbhairityanyatra vā tatrārthaḥ | natvayaṃ mṛdusphuṭabandhaniṣedhaḥ | iti kiṃ kena saṃ[21a]gatam | tasmāt trayo 'pi bandhā dākṣiṇātyairiṣyante, bandhavaiṣamyaṃ tu neṣṭamiti ||
mādhuryaṃ nirdiśannāha—
madhuraṃ rasavadvāci vastunyapi rasaḥ sthitaḥ |
yena mādyanti dhīmanto madhuneva madhuvratāḥ || 51 ||
yatkāvyaṃ rasavatsarasamityanūdya madhuramiti vidhīyate | kva punarasau varttate yena yuktaṃ madhuraṃ syāt | śabde 'rthe ca | prakara[ṇa]sambhavāditi darśayannāha—vācītyādi | [vāci] śabde [vastuni a]rthe ca | rasaḥ sthitaḥ tiṣṭhati | ubhayaṃ rasavat madhuramityarthaḥ | kiṃ teneti cedāha—yenetyādi | yena rasena yena rasavatā kāvyena āsvāditena hetunā mādyanti prītiviśeṣaṃ nirviśanti dhīmantaḥ kavayo rasajñāḥ | kathamityāha—madhunetyādi | madhunā kusumāsavena madhuvratā bhramarā iva | madhu vrataṃ bhojanaṃ yeṣāmiti | yathā madhunātyantaṃ prīyante madhulihaḥ tathā kavayastādṛśena kāvyenetyarthaḥ ||
na jñāyate kīdṛśo 'sau iti viśeṣeṇa darśayannāha—
yayā kayāpi śrutyā yat samānamanubhūyate |
tadrūpādipadāsattiḥ sānuprāsā rasāvahā || 52 ||
yat padaṃ samānaṃ sadṛśaṃ padāntareṇānubhūyate śrūyate | kiṃ varṇāvṛtyā netyāha—yayā kayāpi śrutyeti | yena kenacit [kā]raṇena padāvayavabhūtena yathākathañcit sthānamātrāsaṃyogādikṛtasāmyena lakṣitaṃ sat tadrūpastathāvidhaḥ sadṛśapadalakṣaṇa ādiruttarottaravijātīyapadāpekṣayā yeṣāṃ padānāṃ tāni tadrūpādīni padāni tadvā rūpaṃ śabdarūpaṃ samānaṃ padamādirādiruttarottarāpekṣayā pūrvaṃ yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | teṣāmāsattirāsannatā yathākathañcit samānaśrutīnāṃ padānāmāsannatā rasamāvahati śrutisubhagatāmātanotīti rasāvahā bhavati | yathākathañcit samānaśrutīni padāni [21b]adūravarttīni kāvye rasavattāṃ saṃpādayanti yato madhuraṃ syāt | ayaṃ ca samānapadāsattirnāma samānaśrutirnāma vā ﻿
śabdarasaḥ dākṣiṇātyairatyantamiṣyate | anuprāso 'pi śabdaraso 'sti, sa kiṃ dākṣiṇātyairneṣyate | so 'pīṣyata ityāha-sānuprāseti | anuprāsasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyati | saha tena varttate sānuprāsā, rasāvahā [ityane]nāvadhāryate | samānaśrutereva rasāvaheti | anuprāso 'pi ca rasamāvahati | tataśca śabdaraso dvividho darśito bhavati | samānapadāsattiranuprāsaśca | anayośca na sahabhāvaniyamaḥ | yathāsambhavaṃ kvacit kāvye samānapadāsattiḥ | kvacidanuprāsaḥ | kvacidubhayām | dvayena tu rahitaṃ virasaṃ kāvyaṃ na svādyate ka vibhiritīdṛśaṃ mādhuryaṃ dvividhaṃ pratipattavyam ||
samānapadāsattimudāharannāha—
eṣa rājā yathā lakṣmīṃ prāptavān brāhmaṇapriyaḥ |
tadāprabhṛti dharmasya loke 'sminnutsavo 'bhavat || 53 ||
kañcit rājānamuddiśyocyate | eṣa rājā ayaṃ nṛpaḥ yathā yataḥ prabhṛti rājyalakṣmīṃ prāptavān narādhipatāmadhigataḥ, tadā prabhṛti tata ārabhya dharmasya śrutismṛtivihitasya sanātanasya varṇāśramācāramārgasya lokayātrāyā utsavo 'bhyudayo nirviśaṅa‍kā pravṛttirabhavat | loke 'smin atra varṇāśramalakṣaṇe jagati | kutaḥ brāhmaṇapriyo yataḥ | brāhmaṇāḥ priyā asyeti | brāhmaṇapriyo hi tadvacanānuvarttī śāstravihitaṃ [dharmaṃ] pravarttayatītyarthaḥ | kvacidiha dīrghakṛtaṃ sādṛśyaṃ kvacit sthānakṛtaṃ kvacit saṃyogakṛtaṃ kvacit kathāñcidityanuva canagamyametat | ata evāha—yayā kayāpi śrutyā yatsamā[22a]namanubhūyate [1.52] iti |
namaḥ sampannakṛtyāya buddhāya jagadarthine |
kandarpavibhramacchedavedhase kleśavidviṣe || ityaparamudāharaṇam ||
asya samānaśrutilakṣaṇasya mādhuryasya gauḍa़vartmani viparyayaṃ darśayannāha—
itīdaṃ nādṛtaṃ gauḍairanuprāsastu tatpriyaḥ |
anuprāsādapi prāyo vaidarbhairidamīpsitam || 54 ||
itīdam evaṃbidhaṃ samānapadāsattilakṣaṇaṃ mādhuryaṃ gauḍa़airnādṛtam, na bahu manyate |
teṣāmidamaviditamiti yāvat | nīrasaṃ tarhi teṣāṃ kāvyamiti cedāha—anuprāsastu tatpriya iti | teṣāṃ gauḍānāṃ priyo bahumānyaḥ | viditānuprāsa[sya] tu anuprāsa eva śabdarasaḥ | dākṣiṇātyānāṃ tu samānapadāsattilakṣaṇaḥ śabdarasaḥ preyānityāha—anuprāsādapītyādi | anuprāsādapyadhikamidaṃ samānapadāsattilakṣaṇaṃ mādhuryamīpsitamiṣṭaṃ vaidarbhairdākṣiṇātyaiḥ prāyo bāhulyena tatprayogāt | tataśca anuprāso 'pi tairiṣyata ityuktaṃ bhavati | na tu tathāsau priyasteṣāṃ yathā samānapadāsattiḥ | tādṛśaṃ hi mādhuryaṃ vyāpakaṃ sarvatra sambhavāt | anuprāsastu na tathā vyāpakaḥ kvacid darśanāt | ata eva prāya idamīpsitamityuktam | śabdarasastūbhayamapi | dvayena tu hīnaṃ nīrasaṃ nāsvādyate kavibhiriti ||
kaḥ punarasāvanuprāso yo gauḍānāṃ priyaḥ? dākṣiṇātyānāṃ cetyavasaraprāptamanuprāsaṃ lakṣaṇato lakṣyataśca darśayannāha—
varṇāvṛttiranuprāsaḥ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca |
pūrvānubhavasaṃskārabodhanī yadyadūratā || 55 ||
varṇasya svaravyañjanalakṣaṇasya āvṛttiḥ punaḥpunaruccāraṇam ityanūdyānuprāso veditavya iti vighīyate | prathamastasya prathamaprayuktasyākṣarasya [22b] anu paścādāsa upakṣepaḥ prayogaḥ anuprāsaḥ | kvāsau sambhavītyāha—pādeṣvityādi | pādeṣu parvāpekṣayā padeṣu cetyetattu gadyāpekṣayā draṣṭavyam | dvayorapi kāvyatayādhikārāt | yadvakṣyati—etad gadyasya jīvitamiti | [1.80]
anuṣṭubādau bṛhati ca vṛtte gadye ca sarvatra sannikarṣato draṣṭavyaḥ yataḥ pratyāsannatayā 'nuprāso gṛhyeta | yadāha—pūrvānubhavetyādi | pūrvasya pūrvaprayuktasya varṇasya anubhavaḥ śrotreṇa grahaṇaṃ pūrvo vā pūrvaprayuktavarṇaviṣayatvāt tasya sambandhī tadanvitattvāt | pūrvānubhavenāhitaḥ saṃskāraḥ pūrvānubhavasaṃskāra iti vā madhyapadalopī samāsa eva | varṇaḥ tajjātīya iti vā ekākārasmārttavikalpajananaśaktilakṣaṇaḥ | tasya bodhanī prabodhikā svānurūpavikalpotpādanābhimukhyakāriṇī adūratā pratyāsannatā punastadvarṇānubhavasvabhāvā yadi bhavati tadā varṇāvṛttiranuprāsaḥ pādeṣu padeṣu ca sampatsyate | anyathā tathāvidhānubhavasaṃskāraprabodhābhāvāttādṛśavikalpānudayāt anuprāso na
syāt | tasmāt sa evāyaṃ varṇa āvṛtta iti yāvatānuprāsapratītiḥ kramate tāvadantaraṃ karttavyam | ativyavadhāne tvanuprāso na labhyate | yadvakṣyati—na tu rāmāmukhāmbhoja [1.58] ityādi | atra cānubhava eva pramāṇam, yathoktaṃ prāk ||
yathākathañcitsamānapadāsattau eva lakṣyataḥ prakāśyaṃ anuprāsamudāharannāha—
candre śaranniśottaṃse kundastabakavibhrame |
indranīlanibhaṃ lakṣma sandadhātyalinaḥ śriyam || 56 ||
samānapadāsattau tu rasāvahatvaṃ prasaṅa‍genoktam | samānapadāsattirapi tu lakṣaṇa[23a]to lakṣyataśca prādhānyena prāguktā | indranīlanibham indranīlamaṇisadṛśaṃ nīlatvāt | lakṣma cihnam | alino bhramarasya śriyaṃ śobhāṃ saṃdavāti bibharti | kutra ? candrai śaṃśāṅa‍ke śaradi varṣātyaye śarado vā niśāyā rātreruttaṃse śiraśśekhare | uttaṃso mūrdhni śekhara ityabhidhānāt | kathamuttaṃsaścandro rūpyata ityāha—kundastabakavibhrameti | kundastabakasyaiva vibhramaḥ śobhā śauklyāt | yataḥ kusumasaṃdohasadṛśaścandrastataḥ śaranniśottaṃsatvena rūṣyate [tadanupāti] ca lakṣma nīlamaṇinopanīyate | atra candra kunda indra sanda itiṃ pādeṣvanuprāsaḥ ||
