ityanuprāsamicchanti nātidūrāntaraśrutim |
na tu rāmāmukhāmbhojasadṛśaścandramā iti || 58 ||
ityevaṃrūpamanantaroktaprakāraṃ nātidūrāntaraśrutimanativiprakṛṣṭavyavadhānaśravaṇam | yāvatā pūrvānubhavasaṃskāraprabodhaḥ prabhavati tāvadantaraśrutimanuprāsamicchanti | sāmānyavacanādubhaye 'pi | [23b] nātidūramantaraṃ yasyāḥ sā śrutiryasyeti hyanyapadārthaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ punardūrāntaraśrutirneṣyata iti tamapi heyatvenodāharati—nātvityādi | rāmāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ mukhaṃ vadanamevāmbhojaṃ padmaṃ tena sadṛśaḥ samānaścandramāḥ śaśāṅa‍ka iti yojyam | atra rāmā ityayaṃ makāraḥ mukhāmbhojasadṛśaścandramā iti dūramāgamyāvṛttaḥ | tato 'yaṃ dūrāntaraśrutiranuprāso vyapadeśamātreṇa na tu grahaṇataḥ | tamīdṛśaṃ necchantyubhaye 'pi | vaidarbhā ekāntena necchanti | gauḍa़aistu tādṛśo 'pīṣyata iti vā draṣṭavyam ||
aparo 'pyanuprāsaprakāro 'sti yaḥ ś‍leṣasaukumāryādiśabdālaṅa‍kāravirodhī | taṃ gauḍa़āḥ prayuñjate na vaidarbhā iti darśayannāha—
smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopaśca naḥ kṛśaḥ |
cyuto māno 'dhiko rāgo moho jāto 'savo gatāḥ || 59 ||
smaraḥ kāmaḥ kharo nṛśaṃsaḥ pramāditvāt | kāntaḥ patiśca khalaḥ pratikūlavarttī vyalīkaśīlatvāt | kāyaḥ śarīram kṛśaḥ kṣīṇaḥ virahadaurbalyāt | kopaśca kāntaviṣayaḥ kṛśo nivṛttaḥ | mānaśca tadviṣayaḥ kiṃ teneti cetovaṣṭambhalakṣaṇaś‍cyato galitaḥ rāgādyabhibhūtatvāt | yadāha rāgo 'dhika iti | rāgo 'bhiṣaṅa‍gaḥ pativiṣayaḥ adhikaḥ prabalo varttate | tataśca moho mūrcchā jātaḥ pravṛttaḥ rāgapakṣatvāt | taduktam—
tīvrābhiṣaṅa‍gaprabhaveṇa vṛttiṃ mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām |
ajñātabhartṛvyasanā muhūrtaṃ kṛtopakāreva ratirbabhūva || iti | [kumārasambhave 3. 73]
asavaḥ prāṇā gatā daśamī daśā jātāsmākamiti kācit virahiṇī virautītyartho yojanīyaḥ ||
﻿
ityādi bandhapāruṣyaṃ śaithilyaṃ ca niyacchati |
ato naivamanuprāsaṃ dākṣiṇātyāḥ prayuñjate || 60 ||
ityādi kāvyam evaṃvidho 'nuprāso bandhasya racanāyāḥ pāruṣyaṃ yatra saukumārya- viparyayaḥ śaithilyaṃ ca ś‍leṣavipakṣaṃ cakārādvaiṣamyaṃ ca niyacchati svīkaroti yataḥ, ataḥ kāraṇāt, evamīdṛśamanuprāśaṃ na prayuñjate dākṣiṇātyā vaidarbhāḥ | gauḍāstu pra[24a]yu- ñjata ityarthāduktaṃ bhavati | tataścānuprāse 'pi vaidarbhagauḍīyayorasti kathañcidviśeṣa iti ||
anuprāsaviśeṣatvāttatprasaṅa‍gena yamakaṃ bhañjayannāha—
āvṛttimeva saṃghātagocarāṃ yamakaṃ viduḥ |
tattu naikāntamadhuramataḥ paścād vidhāsyate || 61 ||
varṇāvṛttimeva nānyat yamakaṃ viduḥ vidanti kathayanti tajjñāḥ iti paramukhena | tadvidagdhociteyaṃ vācoyuktiriti sarvatrānusaratvenām | ko 'nayorbheda ityāha—saṃghāta- gocarāmiti | ayamanayorbhedaḥ | ekavarṇaviṣayāvṛttiranuprāsaḥ | anekavarṇaviṣayā tu yamakamiti | saṃghātaḥ varṇasamudāyo gocaro viṣayo yasyā iti vigraha[ḥ/?/] | tat kiṃ nocyate ityāha—tattvityādi | tattu yamakam | tuśabdo 'rthāntaravivakṣāyām | ekāntena sākalyena sarveṇa, madhuraṃ ca sarvaṃ na bhavati, prāyo gūḍha़ārthatvena aprasannatvāt | tattu madhurameva yatprasannam | samānaśrutyanuprāsayostvekāntamadhuratā sarvathā prasannatvāt | ekāntamadhuraṃ cātra prastutam | ataḥ naikāntamadhurattvāt paścād duṣkare vidhāsyate prati- pādayiṣyate | prabhedato lakṣaṇatastūktameveti ||
yaduktaṃ vāci vastunyapi rasaḥ sthita [1. 51] iti tatreyatā vāci raso darśitaḥ | samprati vastuni rasaṃ vivarītumupakramate—
kāmaṃ sarvo 'pyalaṃkāro rasamarthe niṣiñcati |
tathāpyagrāmyataivainaṃ bhāraṃ vahati bhūyasā || 62 ||
kāmamityabhyupagame yadi nāmetyarthaḥ | alaṅa‍kāro 'rthālaṅa‍kāraḥ jātyādiprabhedaḥ sarvo 'pi naika eva kaścit arthe vastuni rasaṃ mādhuryaṃ niṣiñcati āvahati | tathāpi evamapi iti viśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ tāṃ darśayati--agrāmyatetyādi | agrāmyatai[24b]vāsabhyataiva
arthasya bhūyasātyarthaṃ vyāpakatvāt enaṃ rasaniṣekalakṣaṇaṃ bhāraṃ dhuraṃ vahati dhatte nānyat | tattva ādarśeyadyagrāmyataiva rasastat kiṃ bhedo nocyate, sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena bhedasambhavāt | raso hi mādhuryasāmānyam, samānaśrutyanuprāsāgrāmyatādisādhāraṇatvena [tasya] pratīteḥ | samānaśrutyādestu viśeṣāvyāvṛttitayāvagamāt | anyadapyevaṃjātīyakamunneyam | jātyādyarthālaṅkāramuktamapi kāvyamagrāmyārthamekāntamadhuramityarthaḥ ||
kīdṛśī tāvad grāmyatā yadviparyayo 'grāmyatā vasturasaḥ syāditi grāmyatāpratipakṣeṇa agrāmyatāṃ darśayitukāmaḥ grāmyatāṃ tāvadudāharati—
kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ na tvaṃ kāmayase katham |
iti grāmyo 'yamarthātmā vairasyāyaiva kalpate || 63 ||
kanye bāle tvaṃ kāmayamānaṃ santaṃ māṃ kathaṃ kiṃ na kāmayase nābhilaṣasi | evaṃ nāma tvaṃ niṣṭhureti | ayamevaṃvidho 'rthātmā vasturūpaṃ grāmyaḥ avidagdhocitaḥ | tataśca vairasyāyaiva amādhuryārthameva kalpate sampadyate na kathamapi rasavattāyai | virasa eva tādṛśo 'rtha iti yāvat | vairasyaṃ ca na kāvyocitamiti nedṛśaṃ kavayaḥ spṛ[śa]ntītyākūtam ||
kīdṛśaṃ tarhi vasturūpamagrāmyam, yadrasāvahamityāha—
kāmaṃ kandarpacaṇḍālo mayi vāmākṣi niṣṭhuraḥ |
tbayi nirmatsaro diṣṭyetyagrāmyo 'rtho rasāvahaḥ || 64 ||
vāmākṣi mañjulocane iti priyāmantraṇam | kandarpaḥ kāma eva caṇḍālaḥ akāṇḍaprahāritvāt | mayi madviṣaye niṣṭhuraḥ krūraṃ praharatītyarthaḥ | kāmaṃ yadi nāma tathāpi sānugraha evāsmākaṃ yattvayi nirmatsaraḥ nirvairaḥ sānukrośastvāṃ na bādhate | ata evāhadiṣṭyeti ānandanivedanam | ayamasmākamānando mahān yattvayi na [25a] praharati | tvatsukhenaiva sukhitā vayam | kiṃ kandarpacaṇḍālena niṣṭhureṇāpi kṛtamiti vakroktyā ātmanastadviṣayamanugata[tvaṃ] tasyāśca vaimukhyamātmani darśayatīti ayamīdṛśo 'rthaḥ agrāmyaḥ sabhyaḥ kāvyocitaḥ tataśca rasāvahaḥ ekāntamaghuraḥ | evaṃvidho vastunyagrāmyatārasaḥ pratipattavyaḥ | aparamatrodāhriyate— ﻿
nanvahaṃ praṇata eva, māninī sā bhavantamavadhīrya vartate |
manmathastvamasi kiṃ na tanmathaḥ kutra vā na tava kāma ! vāmatā || iti ||
yathārtho grāmyastathā śabdo 'pi grāmyo 'sti, so 'pi varjanīya iti darśayannāha—
śabdepi grāmyatāstyeva sā sabhyetarakīrtanam |
yathā yakārādipadaṃ ratyutsavanirūpaṇe || 65 ||
na kevalamarthe śabde vācake 'pi grāmyatāstveva na nāsti | kīdṛśītyāha—setyādi | sā grāmyatā sabhyetare asabhyā rathyāpuruṣāsteṣāṃ kīrtanaṃ yat kiyadasabhyasamudāhṛtaṃ vacanaṃ grāmyatā | padagatagrāmyatetyuktam | yatheti nidarśanena vyanakti—ratyutsavasya nidhuvanānandasya nirūpaṇe prakāśane karttavye yakārādipadaṃ yakāramādiryasya tacca tat padaṃ ceti vigrahaḥ | susiddhaṃ khalvetadaśiṣṭavacanam |tathāvidhaṃ sarvaṃ grāmyaṃ draṣṭavyam | nedameveti yathāśabdasyārthaḥ ||
anyaḥ śabde grāmyatāprakāro 'sti, so 'pi varjanīya iti vyutpādayannāha—
padasandhānavṛttyā vā vākyārthatvena vā punaḥ |
duṣpratītikaraṃ grāmyaṃ yathā yā bhavataḥ priyā || 66 ||
padayoḥ sandhānaṃ saṅgatirānantaryaṃ tasya vṛttyā sthityā | veti samuccaye | vākyasya padasamudāyasyāsa[ttyādiyukta][25b]syārthaḥ kriyākārakaviśeṣalakṣaṇamamidheyaṃ tad‌bhāvaḥ | sa eva vākyārthatvaṃ tena vā tena ca hetunā punaraparametat | na kevalaṃ pūrvakaṃ naikaika- padārthanirūpaṇena kiṃ tu vākyārthasya vibhāvanenetyarthaḥ | duṣṭāmasabhyāṃ śabdataḥ na tu vastutaḥ, tasyaiva vastunaḥ śabdāntareṇāduṣṭatvāt pratītimavagamaṃ karotīti duṣpratītikaraṃ vākyaṃ tataśca grāmyamasabhyaṃ vidyate | yathetyudāharaṇena spaṣṭyati | yā ityasya padasya bhavata ityanena padena sandhāne sati grāmyaṃ pratīyate | yā tava priyeti padāntarasandhāne nivartate | tadīdṛśaṃ padasandhānaṃ grāmyaṃ buddhyā pariharaṇīyamiti ||
vākyārthagrāmyamupaharati—
paraṃ prahṛtya viśrāntaḥ puruṣo vīryavāniti |
evamādi na śaṃsanti mārgayorubhayorapi || 67 ||
﻿
paraṃ śatruṃ prahṛtya hatvā vīryavān śūraḥ puruṣo viśrānto vyavasthita ityeko 'rtha- stāvadagrāmyaḥ | param atyarthaṃ prahṛtyābhihatya vīryavānupacitapradhānadhātuḥ puruṣaḥ viśrānto virataḥ patita ityaparo grāmyo vākyārthaḥ pratīyata iti vākyārthagrāmyametat | evamādī- dṛśamarthagrāmyaṃ śabdagrāmyaṃ cobhayorapi vaidarbhagauḍīyayormārgayorekasminnapi na śaṃsanti nādriyante tadvida eva | tacca prāyograhaṇasaṃgṛhītam |
kasyacit sahasotthānamagre vidadhato madāt | parāghātapravṛttasya patanāyaiva jāyate ||
iti vākyārthagrāmyodāharaṇamaparamiti ||
bhaginītyādeḥ kā gatirityāha—
bhaginībha[26a]gavatyādi sarvatraivānumanyate |
vibhaktamiti mādhuryamucyate sukumāratā || 68 ||
bhaginī bhagavatī subhagā durbhagetyādi sarvatraiva śāstre kāvye loke cānumanyate ādriyate | tatastādṛśamagrāmyaṃ sabhyameva | tataśca prayujyate eva kavibhiḥ ||
mādhuryaṃ nigamayannāha—vibhaktamityādi | ityanena prakāreṇa mādhuryaṃ vibhaktaṃ nirdiṣṭam | sukumāratedānīmucyate nirdiśyate tadanantaramupadiṣṭatvāditi ||
aniṣṭhurākṣaraprāyaṃ sukumāramiheṣyate |
bandhaśaithilyadoṣo hi darśitaḥ sarvakomale || 69 ||
aniṣṭhurāṇi aparuṣāṇi akṣarāṇi varṇāḥ prāyāṇi bhūyāṃsi yasmiṃstathā aniṣṭhurairvākṣaraiḥ prāyaṃ samadhikaṃ kāvyamityanūdya sukumāramaparuṣamiṣyata iti vidhiḥ | niṣṭhurāṇi tu svalpānīti prāyagrahaṇena sūcitama | iheti vaidarbhamārge sarvāniṣṭhurākṣaraṃ kiṃ na sukumāramiṃṣyata iti cedāha—bandhetyādiṃ | hiryasmātsarvāṇiṃ akṣarāṇi komalāniṃ sukumārāṇi yasmiṃstattathā | sarvairevākṣaraiḥ komalaṃ tasmin kāvye bandhasya niveśanasya śaithilyaṃ lāghavaṃ tadeva doṣo vaikṛtaṃ darśita udāhṛtaḥ pūrvam | mālatīmālā lolāliṃkaliteti [1.43] | tasmādaniṣṭhurākṣaraprāyameva sukumāramiheṣyate na sarvāniṣṭhurākṣaramiti yojyama ||
﻿
sukumāratāmudāharannāha—
maṇḍalīkṛtya barhāṇi kaṇṭhairmadhuragītibhiḥ |
kalāpinaḥ pranṛtyanti kāle jīmūtamālini || 70 ||
varhāṇyaṅgaruhāṇiṃ maṇḍalīkṛtya chatrākāreṇa viṃtatya madhurā manoharā gītiḥkekālakṣaṇaṃ gānaṃ yeṣāṃ taiḥ kaṇṭhairlakṣitā madhuraṃ gāyanta ityarthaḥ | kalā[26b]pino mayūrāḥ pranṛtyanti jīmūtamālini meghadhāriṇi | malamalladhāraṇe | kāle samaye prāvṛṣīti yāvat ||
prativiśiṣṭasyānekasya kāvyadharmasyābhāve 'pi saukumāryaguṇādīdṛśaṃ kāvyamupādeyamiti saukumāryaṃ varṇayannāha—
ityanūrjita evārtho nālaṅkāro 'pi tādṛśaḥ |
sukumāratayaivaitadārohati satāṃ sukham || 71 ||
ityayamevaṃvidho 'rthaḥ abhidheyaśarīram | ūrjito dīptaḥ prativiśiṣṭaḥ | na tathā 'nūrjita eva norjito 'pi | alaṃkārastarhi prativiśiṣṭastenedamādeyaṃ kāvyaṃ na saukumāryaguṇāditi cedāha—nālaṃkāro 'pi tādṛśa iti | alaṃkāro 'pyatra svabhāvoktilakṣaṇaḥ tādṛśastathābhūtaḥ prativiśiṣṭo na bhavati yādṛśo '[nya]tra | sa ca vibhāvanādiḥ | na kevalamartha ityapiśabdārthaḥ | ko 'trārthasyālaṅkārasya ca bhedaḥ yenocyate 'laṃkāro 'rthaścānūrjita iti | ya evārthaḥ sa evālaṃkārā 'smin gamyate | naitadevam | artho hi dharmī, svabhāvoktiścālaṃkāro dharmaḥ pratīyata iti mahān bhedaḥ, dharmadharmibhedasya suprasiddhatvāt | anyatrāpyevaṃvidho 'tra bhedaḥ | tathāpi etadidamīdṛśaṃ kāvyaṃ sukumāratayaiva saukumāryeṇa kevalena śabdālaṃkāreṇa puraskṛtaṃ satāṃ vidagdhānāṃ mukham ānanam ārohati gocarīkaroti sukumāramityevedṛśaṃ kavibhirupādīyata iti yāvat | yadi punarartha ūjitā 'laṃkāraśca, sutarāṃ sukumāraṃ kāvyaṃ ramaṇīyamityākūtam ||
haṃsā bhramanti padmānāṃ kānane madama[27a]ntharāḥ |
mañju[bhir]dhvanibhiḥ karṇaiścaraṇairvarṇavibhramaiḥ || ityaparamudāharaṇamiti ||
﻿
saukumāryaviparyayaṃ gauḍa़vartmani darśayannāha—
dīptamityaparairbhūm‍nā kṛcchrodyamapi badhyate |
nyakṣeṇa kṣapitaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇāditi || 72 ||
dīptamūrjitaṃ sāṭopametaditi manyamānairaparaiḥ paurastyaiḥ kṛcchrodyaṃ durvacaṃ kaṣṭoccāraṇamasukumārataramapi kāvyaṃ badhyate prayujyate na kevalasukumāramātramityapiṃśabdaḥ | bhūm‍nā prāyaḥ | tataśca sukumāramapi kiṃciduṣṇamadhunyāyena yenopayujyata iti sūcayati tadudāharati | nyakṣaṃ kāts‍nai nikṛṣṭhe ca iti vaijayantī |nyakṣeṇa niḥśeṣeṇa kṣapitaḥ nihataḥ kṣaṇāt sapadi stokena kālenetyarthaḥ | kṣatriyāṇāṃ rājñāṃ pakṣo vargaḥ paraśurāmeṇānyena vā kenaciditi gamyate | nanvetadvivakṣitaṃ kṛcchrodyamātraṃ tūdāhṛtamiti yathā tādṛśamityarthaḥ ||
arthavyaktiṃ vyākhyātumāha—
arthavyaktiraneyatvamarthasya hariṇoddhṛtā |
bhūḥ khurakṣuṇṇanāgāsṛglohitādudadheriti || 73 ||
arthasya kāvyābhidheyavastuno neyatvaṃ śabdato 'rthato vāpratītiranyathāvagamaḥ syāt | gatyantarābhāvāt | yadvakṣyati—na hi pratītiḥ sulabhā śabdanyāyavilaṃghinī | iti | [1. 75]
neyatvabhedamanūdyārthavyaktirvidhīyate | tadudāharati | harītyādi, hariṇā varāharūpadhāriṇā viṣṇunā pṛthivī bhūruddhṛtā samuttāritā udadheḥ samudrāt | kiṃviśiṣṭāt | khurairmahāvarāhasyetyarthād‌gamyate | caraṇāgraiḥ kṣuṇṇānāṃ cūṇitānāṃ nāgānāmuragāṇāmasṛjā rudhireṇa lohitādaruṇāt [/?/27b] itīdṛśamaneyaṃ kāvyam | atra hi nāgaśoṇitaṃ śabdopāttaṃ yadupādhikamaruṇatvamarṇavasya | nyāyopāttaṃ tu |
ujjahāra khurakṣuṇṇamahoragakulākulāt |
mahāvarāhaḥ pṛthivīmaruṇādarṇavāt kṣaṇamiti ||
atra yadyapi nāgarudhiramaśabdopāttaṃ yadupādhikalohitatvamudadheḥ, tathāpi khurakṣuṇṇamahoragakulākulādarṇavādaruṇādityukteḥ sāmarthyāt sphuṭaṃ nāgarudhiraṃ gamyate | ﻿
tathāvidhasyodadhernāgarudhirāvyabhicārāt | na hi sarvatra śābdī pratītiḥ kāvye, arthe api tasyā darśanāt | yadāha kālidāsaḥ—
mahendramāsthāya mahokṣarūpaṃ yaḥ saṃprati prāptapinākilīlaḥ |
cakāra bāṇairasurāṅganānāṃ gaṇḍasthalīḥ proṣitapatralekhāḥ || iti | [raghuvaṃśe 6. 72]
atra hi tena rājñā bāṇairasurāḥ samare hatā ityartho vivakṣitaḥ kavinā | na cāsuravadhaḥ śabdopāttaḥ | tathāpi asurāṅganānāṃ gaṇḍasthalīḥ proṣitapatralekhāścakāra bāṇairityukte sāmānyādasurā hatā iti nyāyopātto 'suravadhastādṛśasya patralekhāpravāsasyāsuravadhāvyabhicārāt | na cedṛśaṃ neyatvam, pratyuta vakroktirīdṛśī guṇa eva kāvyasya | tataḥ śabdena nyāyena vācinā yatrārtho netavyastādṛśaṃ neyaṃ vijñeyamanyathā tathāvidhaṃ kāvyaṃ sarvaṃ duṣyediti ||
neyamudāharannāha—
mahī mahāvarāheṇa lohitāduddhṛtodadheḥ |
itoyatyeva nirdiṣṭe neyatvamuragāsṛjaḥ || 74 ||
lohitādudadheruddhṛtā mahī mahāvarāhenetyukte kathaṃ lohitatvamudadheriti nayaṃ na tāvatsvābhāvikam | aupādhikaṃ tu bhavet | na copādhistādṛśaḥ śabdopātto nyāyalabdho vā yena lohitatvamudadheḥ syāt | [28a] yathoktaṃ prāk | tasmādabhiprāyamātrametat mayaivaṃ vivakṣitamiti | na caitāvatā pratītiḥ prāpyate, śabdasya nyāyasya tādṛśasyānupādānāt | yadi punaraparaḥ kaścittādṛśamarthaṃ kathañcit svayamabhyūhya gṛhṇīyāttasyaivāsau guṇaḥ | kāvyaṃ tu tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭameva | ata eva lohitādudadherityetāvad vaktuṃ na tu tathāvidhaḥ kaścidviśeṣa upāttaḥ, yato nāgarudhiralohitatvamudadhergamyeta | yathoktaṃ prāk | tataśceyatyeva lohitādudadheruddhṛtā mahāvarāheṇa mahīti etāvatyeva nirviśeṣaśabdena nyāyena vā tādṛśena rahite vākye nirdiṣṭena prayujya uragāsṛjo nāgaraktasya nyetvaṃ mayaivaṃ vivakṣitamitiṃ vivakṣāmātragamyatvaṃ jāyate | na tu śabdopāttaṃ nyāyopāttaṃ vā nāgaśoṇitaṃ yadupādhiṃkamaruṇatvamarṇavasya | na ca tādṛśaṃ sulabhaṃ nyāyaśabdānāṃ rūḍha़syārthasya vivakṣāmātreṇa duṣprāpatvāt | tasmādīdṛśaṃ neyamavagamyaṃ pariṃharttaṃvyam iti ||
﻿
neyaṃ sarvaireva neṣyata iti darśayannāha—
nedṛśaṃ bahu manyante mārgayorumayorapi |
na hi pratītiḥ sulabhā śabdanyāyavilaṅghinī || 75 ||
īdṛśamanantaroktaprakāraṃ neyamubhayorapi vaidarbhagauḍīyayormārgayorvartmanoḥ | na vaidarbha eva | na bahu manyante nādriyante na prayujyante tadvidaḥ |
tacca eṣāṃ viparyayaḥ prāyo lakṣyate gauḍavartmani | [1. 42] iti prāyograhaṇena saṃgṛhītaṃ kiṃ bahu manyata iti ce[28b]dāha—na hītyādi | hiśabdo yasmādarthe | yataḥ pratītirarthasyāvagamaḥ śabdaṃ vācakaṃ nyāyasāmarthyaṃ ca tādṛśamanupadarśanāllaṅghayati tyajatyanupādā[nā]diti, śabdanyāyaviṃlaṅghinī na sulabhā na prāpyate kasyacid viṃvakṣāmātreṇa tādṛśena | tasmānnecchanti mūlahāneḥ | nyāyopāttaḥ śabdopātto vā yo 'rtho na bhavati sa na pratīyate 'ntastattvamātreṇetyarthaḥ | tasmāt śabdādarthādvā pratītārthamaneyaṃ tadviparītaṃ tu neyamiti sthitam ||
udāratvaṃ nirdiśannāha—
utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaścidyasminnukte pratīyate |
tadudārāhvayaṃ tena sanāthā sarvapaddhatiḥ || 76 ||
yasmin kasmiṃścit ukte prayukte kaścidvivakṣiṃto guṇo viśeṣastyāgādilakṣaṇa uktarṣavānadhimātraḥ pratīyate avagamyate tat kāvyamudārāhvayamudāraṃ nāma veditavyamiti vidhiḥ | udāramityāhvayaḥ saṃjñā yasyeti vigrahaḥ | yadyevaṃ sa evotkarṣavān guṇa udāro 'stu, kāvyaṃ kathamudāramucyate iti cedāha—tenetyādi | yatastenotkarṣavatā guṇena vācyatvenāpiṃ rūpeṇa sarvā paddhatiḥ sarvaṃ tatkāvyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ yatkiñcit sanāthā yuktā, tasmādudāraguṇayogāt sarvaṃ tat kāvyamudāramiti draṣṭavyam ||
﻿
tadudāharannāha—
arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭiḥ stvanmukhe patitā sakṛt |
tadavasthā punardeva nānyasya mukhamīkṣate || 77 ||
arthināṃ yācakānāṃ dṛṣṭiścakṣuḥ kṛpaṇā dīnā nirānandadaurgatyopahatatvāt yācñāmaraṇāvasthāprāptatvācca tvanmukhe vadane sakṛdekavāraṃ patitā pravṛttā satī tadavasthā sā [29a]kṛpaṇā avasthā yasyā iti vigrahaḥ | punastathaiva kṛpaṇā aprāptakāmatvādanyasya dāturmukhaṃ nekṣate na paśyati deveti kaścidrājā stūyate | tvāmekavāramarthitayā prāpya punaranyaṃ na yācate tvatta eva pūrṇamanorathatvāt | ākāramātreṇa vārthitāṃ jñātvā kṛtārthayasi yāvad yācñākṣarāṇi kṛpaṇāni nodgīrantītyarthaḥ ||
kaḥ punarihotkarṣavān guṇo yena sanāthaṃ sarva tatkāvyamudāraṃ syāditi vivṛṇvannāha—
iti tyāgasya vākye 'smin‍nutkarṣaḥ sādhu lakṣyate |
anenaiva pathānyacca samānanyāyamūhyatām || 78 ||
ityasminna[na]ntarokte vākye kāvye tyāgasya dānasya guṇotkarṣaḥ atiśayaḥ sādhu samyak parisphuṭaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ, lakṣyate pratīyate | tasmāttadyogenotkarṣavatā guṇenedaṃ kāvyaṃ sarvaṃ sanāthamudāramākhyāyata iti yojyam | prakāramimamanyatrāti[di]śannāha—anenetyādi | anenaivoktena pathā vidhinā anyacca paramapi samānaḥ sadṛśaḥ nyāyaḥ prakāro yasya tat samānanyāyamevaṃjātīyakamū[hya]tāṃ svayamanugamyatām | diśo darśitatvācca śakyamanusartumīdṛśamiti bhāvaḥ | tadyathā—
tvannāmagrahaṇādeva deva ! tvadariyoṣitaḥ |
śokāruṇāni cakṣūṃṣi vahanti vidhavā iva || iti |
aparaprakāraṃ darśayannāha—
ś‍lādhyairviśeṣaṇairyuktamudāraṃ kaiścidiṣyate |
yathā līlāmbujakrīḍāsarohemāṅgadādayaḥ || 79 ||
ś‍lādhyairutkṛṣṭairviśeṣaṇairupādhibhiryuktaṃ saṃgatamudāraṃ kaiścidi[29b]ti paurastyai﻿
riṣyate | [tanmate] tadapyastviti bhāvaḥ | yathetyudāharati | līlārthamambujaṃ, krīḍārthaṃ saraḥ, hemamayamaṅgadamiti [sarvatra] madhyapadalopī samāsaḥ| līlāmbujakrīḍa़āsarohemā[ṅgadā......ā]diryeṣāṃ te | ime ś‍lāghyaviśeṣaṇayuktaprakārā līlādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ ś‍lāghyatvāt | tadyogāt kāvyamudāraṃ draṣṭavyam | ādiśabdenādarśabhittimaṇimekhalākusumasrag‌vibhramamaṇḍanāṅgalekhādiparigrahaḥ ||
ojaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇamitiṃ nirdiśannāha—
ojaḥ samāsabhūyastvametadgadyasya jīvitam |
padye 'pyadākṣiṇātyānāmidamekaṃ parāyaṇam || 80 ||
samāsasyaikārthavṛtterbhūyastvaṃ bāhulyamityanūdya ojo vidhīyate | tadetadojaḥ samāsabāhulyalakṣaṇaṃ gadyasyoktarūpasya jīvitaṃ hṛdayaṃ sāraṃ na padyasya tatpradhānatvādnadyasyetiṃ | vaidarbhāṇāṃ dākṣiṇātyānām | gauḍānāṃ tu idamoja ekaṃ kevalaṃ parāyaṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ padye 'pi viṣaye na kevalaṃ gadye tataścātrāpi matabheda iti ||
tasyaiva prakārāntaraṃ viṣayaṃ ca darśayannāha—
tad gurūṇāṃ laghūnāṃ ca bāhulyālpatvamiśraṇaiḥ |
uccāvacaprakāraṃ sad dṛśyamākhyāyikādiṣu || 81 ||
tadojaḥ uccāvaco vyākulaḥ aniyataḥ prakāro gatiḥ prayogo yasya taduccāvacaprakāraṃ sat bhavat dṛśyaṃ vijñeyamākhyāyikādiṃṣu gadyaprabandheṣu | ādiṃśabdena kathādiparigrahaḥ | kathamuccāvacaprakārāntaraṃ bhavatītyāha—gurūṇāṃ saṃyogaparāṇāṃ dīrghāṇāṃ ca laghūnāmakṣarā[30a]ṇāṃ ca bāhulyenopacayena alpatvenāsañcayena miśraṇaṃ samatvena cetyevaṃ bāhulyālpatvamiṃśraṇaiḥ kāraṇairuccāvacaprakāram | niyamābhāvāt kvacid gurūṇāṃ bāhulyaṃ laghūnāmalpatvaṃ, kvacillaghūnāṃ bāhulyaṃ gurūṇāmalpatvaṃ, kvacidubhayeṣāṃ samatvamitīyantaḥ prakārā bhaveyuriti ||
paurastyānāmojaḥpadyaviṣayamudāharannāha—
astamastakaparyastasamastārkāṃśusaṃstarā |
pīnastanasthitātāmrakamravastreva vāruṇī || 82 ||
﻿
vāruṇī paścimā dika | bhātīti gamyate | kibhūtā ? astasya parvatasya mastake śirasi śikhare paryastaḥ patitaḥ samasto niravaśeṣaḥ, dinapariṇateḥ tatra saṃhārāt | arkasyādityasyāṃśūnāṃ raśmīnāṃ saṃstaraḥ santāno yasyāmiti samāsabāhulyaṃ sāmānyena darśitam | viśe[ṣeṇā]tiprasaṅgāt | evaṃvidhā kathamiva bhātītyāha—pīnetyādi | pīne mahati stane payodhare sthitaṃ saktam ātāmraṃ lohitaṃ kamraṃ kāntaṃ vastraṃ vasanaṃ yasyāstatheti bhāti | iha lohitatvaṃ śabdopāttamātāmraśabdaprayogāt | pūrvaṃ tu nyāyopāttam, astaparvatapatitānāmādityaraśmīnāṃ lohitatvāvyabhicārāt | na cedṛśī neyaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk | ata evoktam—na hi pratītiḥ sulabhā śabdanyāyavilaṅghinī | [1. 75] astaparvataḥ stanasadṛśo vāruṇyāḥ | arkāṃśusaṃstara[statra] patitaḥ tāmravastratulya iti draṣṭa[30b]vyam ||
iti padye 'pi paurastyā badhnantyojasvinīgiraḥ |
anye tvanākulaṃ hṛdyamicchantyojo girāṃ yathā || 83 ||
ityevaṃvidhā ahṛdyā ojasvinīḥ samāsabāhulyavatīḥ giraḥ śabdān padye 'pi kāvye, na kevalaṃ gadye | badh‍nanti racayanti paurastyā gauḍāḥ | dākṣiṇātyā api kvacit padye 'pyojaḥ prayuñjate | tattu viśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ tuśabdaḥ | anākulamagahanam | ata eva hṛdyaṃ subhagam ojaḥ kathitalakṣaṇam icchanti prayuñ‍jate iti ||
kīdṛśaṃ tadityudāharati—
payodharataṭotsaṅgalagnasandhyātapāṃśukā |
kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati || 84 ||
vāruṇī digaparā | kiṃbhūtā ? payodharo meghaḥ stanaśca | śabdaśleṣo 'yam | tasya taṭaḥ ekadeśaḥ sa evotsaṅgo madhyabhāgaḥ | tatra lagnaḥ sthitaḥ sandhyātapaḥ | dinapariṇatiḥ sa evāṃśukaṃ raktaṃ vastraṃ yasyāḥ sā tathābhūtā kasya nāma kāminaścetaścittaṃ kāmāturaṃ manmathākrāntaṃ na kariṣyati ? sarvasyaiva karoti rāgānukūlatvāttasyā avasthāyāḥ | tādṛśamanākulaṃ hṛdyamojaḥ prayuñ‍jate vaidarbhāḥ | ﻿
salīlahasitajyots‍nākīlitādharapallavaḥ |
mukhaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ kasya hṛdayaṃ na hariṣyati ||
dhāvitā api te dantāḥ śyāmā mugdhe mudhā śramaḥ |
mukhābjasaurabhākṛṣṭapratibimbitaṣaṭpadāḥ ||
vidagdhamadhuras‍nigdhamugdhasambhrāntalocanam |
lalitabhrūlatollāsahāsahāri mukhaṃ tava || ityaparamudāharaṇatrayam ||
kāntaṃ vibhajaya[31a]nnāha—
kāntaṃ sarvajagatkāntaṃ laukikārthānatikramāt |
tacca vārtāmidhāneṣu varṇanāsvapi dṛśyate || 85 ||
sarvasya vaidarbhasyetarasya vā jagato janasya kāntaṃ manoharaṃ yat tat kāntaṃ vijñeyamitividhiḥ kuta evamityāha—laukikārthānatikramāditi | lokavidito 'rtho laukikam | tasya laukikasyārthasyābhidheyasyānatikramāt anuvṛtteḥ kāraṇāt | laukikārthānuvṛtterhi kāvyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sarveṣāṃ kāntaṃ bhavati | tasya viniyogaviṣayaṃ darśayannāha—taccetyādi | tacca kāntam | arthāntarasamuccaye cakāraḥ | tadāha—vārtābhidhāneṣu pravṛttinivedaneṣu varṇanāsvapi vastuguṇodbhāvinīṣu ca dṛśyate prayujyate ||
tadudāharati—
gṛhāṇi nāma tānyeva taporāśirbhavādṛśaḥ |
sambhāvayati yānyevaṃ pāvanaiḥ pādapāṃsubhiḥ || 86 ||
kenacit tapodhanena kaścid gṛhamedhī svagṛhāgatena vārtāpṛṣṭaḥ san abhidhatte gṛhāṇi gehāni nāma tānyevocyante 'rthato nāmataśca nānyāni | ata eva nāmetyuktam | saṃbhāvanāyāṃ vā nāmaśabdaḥ | katamāni ? yāni gṛhāṇi evamāgamanotsavena pādapāṃsubhiścaraṇareṇubhiḥ pāvanaiḥ pavitraiḥ jāhnavījalairiva saṃbhāvayati mānayati punāti bhavādṛśaḥ tvadvidhaḥ taporāśiḥ sākṣāddharmasañcayaḥ | tathābhidhaṃ vārtābhidhānaṃ sarvajagatkāntaṃ laukitvāt tādṛśasyārthasya | uktaṃ ca— ﻿
agnicit kapilā sa[trī] rājā bhikṣumahādadhiḥ |
[31b] dṛṣṭā mātā punantyete tvaṃ punaḥ smaraṇādapi || iti |
anayoranavadyāṅgi stanayojṛmbhamāṇyoḥ |
avakāśo na paryāptastava bāhulatāntaram || 87 ||
anavadyāṅgi sarvāṅgasundari ! anayāḥ tava stanayoḥ jṛmbhamāṇayoḥ parivarddhamāṇyoḥ bāhulatāntaraṃ hṛdayaṃ paryāptaḥ paripūrṇaḥ avakāśaḥ sthānaṃ, [na] bhavati | svalpametatsthānaṃ yat bāhulatāntaraṃ nāma | atimātrastanaunnatyād ityayamapi laukika evārthaḥ | [ tataḥ sarvajagatkāntamīdṛśaṃ varṇanamiti ||
kīdṛśaṃ sambhāvyate yena sarvajagatkāntaṃ syāditi cedāha—
iti saṃbhāvyamevaitadviśeṣākhyānasaṃskṛtam ||
kāntaṃ bhavati sarvasya lokayātrānuvartinaḥ || 88 ||
iti parata idamevaṃvidhaṃ viśeṣākhyānasaṃskṛtaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ naiva loke na sambhāvyata eva laukikārthānusāreṇa prayuktatvāt | prakṛtāpekṣayā tayorviśeṣaḥ pādapāṃsūnāṃ ca pāvanatvaṃ stanayośca tādṛśavijṛmbhanaṃ viśeṣo 'tiśayaḥ tasyākhyānenodbhāvanenāsaṃskṛtaṃ vyutpannam | viśeṣo vā ākhyāyate yena tadeva saṃskṛtaṃ suprayuktatvāt | kāvyaṃ sambhāvyamiti prakṛtam | tataśca lokayātrānuvartinaḥ lokārthānusāriṇaḥ sarvavidagdhasyetarasya vā janasya kāntaṃ manoharam, tādṛśaṃ kāvyaṃ bhavati jāyate |
adya jātā vayaṃ deva prāptāḥ sarvāśca siddhayaḥ |
yadevaṃ puṇyayā spṛṣṭā dṛṣṭyā smitaprasannayā ||
[pra]paśyātmānametasminnujjvale gaṇḍamaṇḍale |
darpaṇānayanaśrāntyā tanvi kiṃ dūyase mudhā || iti a[32a]paramudāharaṇayugalam ||
gauḍābhimataṃ vārtābhidhānaṃ varṇanaṃ ca darśayannāha— ﻿
lokātīta ivātyarthamadhyāropya vivakṣitaḥ |
yo 'rthastenātituṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ || 89 ||
lokātīto 'laukika iva lokarañnāt | vyutpannāstu rajyante | ata eva ivaśabdaprayogaḥ | yo 'rtho 'tyarthamatimātramadhyāropyate parikalpyate, yathā ca sarvajagatkāntaṃ kāvyaṃ jāyate | adhyāropamātraṃ tu pūrvasminnapi vidyate iti atyarthamityuktam | vivakṣitaḥ prayuktaḥ kāvyarūpeṇa tena tathāvidhenārthena abhidheyena tathāvidhārthānuvartinā kāvyeneti yāvat | vidagdhā vyutpannā atituṣyanti anurajyante sutarāṃ tathāvidhoktyā, ahatabuddhitvāt | itare 'vidagdhā nātituṣyanti, tādṛśāmabhāvitasvabhāvatvāt | asaṃbhāvyametadatiprasaṅgo 'yamiti nānurajyante ityarthaḥ | ata, eva sarvajagatkāntaṃ na bhavati, vidagdhānāmeva rañjanāt | yathetyudāharati—
devadhiṣṇyamivārādhyamadyaprabhṛti no gṛham |
yuṣmatpādarajaḥpātadhautānaḥśeṣakilviṣam || 90 ||
devāyatanamiva yathā adya prabhṛti etaddinamārabhya no 'smākaṃ gṛhamidamārādhyamupāsyaṃ yūjanīyaṃ kṛtam | yuṣmākaṃ pādayoścaraṇapadmayo rajasāṃ reṇūnāṃ pātena saṃsargeṇāghamarṣaṇena dhautamapanītaṃ niḥśeṣa samastaṃ kilviṣaṃ pāpaṃ yasmistathā | yata evaṃ tasmādārādhyamitiḥprakṛtam | vārtābhidhānamātramīdṛśamalauki kārthameva | tataśca sarvajagat‌kāntamiti ||
alpaṃ nimiṃtamākāśamanālocyaiva vedhasā |
idamevaṃvidhaṃ bhāvi bhavatyāḥ stanajṛmbhaṇam || 91 ||
idaṃ pratyakṣam evaṃvidhamatiśayaṃ bhavatyāḥ tava stanayājṛ mbhaṇaṃ vyāpana bhāvi bhaviṣyatkālāpekṣayā anālocyādṛṣṭ‍vaivālpaṃ saṃkīrṇaṃ yathā na mātaḥ stanau, ākāśaṃ vyoma nirmitaṃ vihitaṃ vedhasā vidhinā yadyālocayiṣyannaivaṃ stokamākāśaṃ niramāsyat prathamaṃ tāvat jātavedā iti varṇanamasaṃskṛtameva || nedṛśaṃ sarvajagatkāntaṃ laukikārthātikramāt ||
﻿
kiṃ tarhīdamucyata iti āha—
idamatyuktirityuktametadgauḍopalālitam |
prasthānaṃ prākpraṇotaṃ tu sāramanyasya vartmanaḥ || 92 ||
idamīdṛśamanantaroktaṃ kāvyamatyuktirityuktamākhyāyate tajjñairiti atyuktirnāmedamityarthaḥ | etadidamanantaroktaṃ gauḍaiḥ paurastyairupalālitamiṣṭamatyantaṃ na vaidarbhasaṃmatamityāha—prasthānamityādi | prākpraṇītaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ gṛhāṇi nāmetyādi prasthānaṃ prakāraḥ sāraṃ jīvitamanyasya vaidarbhasya vartmano mārgasya | tādṛśaṃ dākṣiṇātyaiḥ prayu[jya]ta iti yāvat ||
samādhimadhikṛtyāha—
anyadharmastato 'nyatra lokasīmānurodhinā |
samyagādhīyate yatra sa samādhiḥ smṛto yathā || 93 ||
anyasya vastunaḥ prakṛtāpekṣayā | dharmaḥ guṇaḥ prasiddhastatastasmānmukhyādanyatra gauṇaviṣaye samyak sādhu | lokasīmānuvartitvameva samyaktvamiha draṣṭavyam | ādhīyate 'dhyāropyate yatra | kena ? lokasīmānurodhinā lokapratītyanuvartinā kavinā | yathā lokapratītiḥ samāda[33a]dhīta nānyathetyarthaḥ | sa evaṃvidho dharmaḥ samādhirnāma kāvye smṛto vijñeya iti vidhiḥ | samādhīyate 'dhyāropyate yasminniti samādhiḥ samāropaviṣaya ucyate | yadyapi samādhīyamānāddharmādanyo nāsti samādhiḥ tathāpi sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena bhedavivakṣayā yatrānyadharmaḥ samādhīyate tat samādhirityuktam | gauṇaśabdavyavahāraḥ kāvyopayogī samādhiriti yāvat | yathetyudāharati ||
kumudāni nimīlanti kamalānyunmiṣanti ca |
iti netrakriyādhyāsāllabdhā tadvācinī śrutiḥ || 94 ||
kumudāni kairavā nimīlanti nimiṣanti kamalāni padmāni unmiṣanti cetyatra katamo dharmaḥ samāhitaḥ ityāha—netretyādi | netrasya kriyā nimeṣonmeṣalakṣaṇā prasiddho dharmaḥ tasmāttato 'nyatra kumudādiṣu adhyāsāt samādhānāt samāropāt kāraṇāt | tadvācinī netrakriyābhidhāyinī śrutirnimīlantītyādikā labdhā prāptā prayukteti yāvat | arthānugāmitvācchabdasya ityevaṃbhūto bhāktaḥ śābdo vyavahāraḥ kāvye samādhināmnā khyāyate ||
﻿
kaściddharmaḥ gauṇaviṣaya eva śobhate kāvye na mukhyagocara iti daśayannāha—
niṣṭhyūtodgīrṇavāntādi gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayam |
atisundaramanyattu grāmyakakṣāṃ vigāhate || 95 ||
niṣṭhyūtaṃ vāntam, udgīrṇaṃ ca | ādiśabdena riktādiparigrahaḥ | tadīdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ gauṇī pradhā[33b]netarā nirūḍha़viṣayādviṣayāntaraparigrahalakṣaṇavṛttiprayogarūpā vyapāśrayo yasya tattathā | gauṇamiti yāvat | atisundaramatyantamanoharamalaṃkārarūpatvāt | anyattu itarat punaḥ gauṇavṛttyavyapāśrayāt mukhyamiti yāvat | grāmyakakṣām asabhyapadavīṃ vigāhate pratipadyate | grāmyamahṛdyamiti kāvye tadukteranucitatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
tadudāharati—
padmānyakāṃśuniṣṭhyūtāḥ pītvā pāvakavipruṣaḥ |
bhūyo vamantīva mukhairudgīrṇāruṇareṇubhiḥ || 96 ||
pāvakavipruṣaḥ tejaḥkaṇikāḥ arkāṃśubhirādityakiraṇairniṣṭhyūtā nirastāḥ pītvā bhūyo 'tyartham | ataśca vamantīva udgirantīva padmānītyutprekṣate mukhairudgīrṇā muktāḥ aruṇā lohitāḥ reṇavaḥ parāgā yairiti vigrahaḥ | utprekṣābījamanena sūcitam | sūryodaye hi vikasanti padmāni tejaḥkaṇān pivantīva lakṣyante raktānparāgānmuñcanti ca pītānagnikaṇān vamantīva dṛśyante | niṣṭhīvanādikaṃ hi sacetanakartṛkaṃ ś‍leṣmādikarmakam | mukhyakāvye ca tādṛśamanucitam | iha tvarkāṃśupadmamukhakartṛkaṃ tejo reṇukarmakaṃ prayuktamiti atisundaram | sacetanakarmakamapi yadi gauṇakartṛkaṃ prayujyeta tadā na grāsyam | yathā—niṣṭhyatamiti [34a] nāma bhāṣase hṛdayagatāṃ mudamudniranniti ||
iti hṛdyamahṛdyaṃ tu niṣṭhīvati vadhūriti |
yugapannaikadharmāṇāmadhyāsaśca mato yathā || 97 ||
itīdṛśaṃ gauṇaṃ hṛdyam atisundaram | ahṛdyaṃ tu grāmyaṃ punarucyate—niṣṭhīvati vadhūriti sacetanāyāḥ ṣṭhīvanaṃ mukhyaṃ prasiddhameva | ekadharmasamādhirayaṃ darśitaḥ | yugapat
ekakālam naikeṣāṃ bahūnāṃ dharmāṇā kriyādirūpāṇāmadhyāsaḥ samādhiśca mata iṣyate | cakāra uktasamuccaye | yathetyudāharati |
gurugarbhetyādi—
gurugabhabharalkāntāḥ stanantyo meghapaṅktayaḥ |
acalādhityakotsaṅgamimāḥ samadhiśerate || 98 ||
gururgṛhītasāratvāt garbho 'ntarbhāgaḥ sa eva bharo bhāraḥ durvahatvāt tasya vā bharo 'vasādaḥ | tena lkāntā glānāḥ stanantyaḥ lkāntyanurūpaṃ śabdaṃ kurvāṇāḥ meghapaṅktayaḥ payodamālā imā etā acalasya parvatasya adhityakāyāḥ uparibhūmerutsaṅgaṃ samadhiśerate 'dhyāsate ||
kiyanto 'tra dharmā adhyastā iti darśayannāha—
utsaṅge śayanaṃ sakhyāḥ stananaṃ gauravaṃ klamaḥ |
itīme garbhiṇīdharmā bahavo 'nyatra darśitāḥ || 99 ||
sakhyāḥ kasyāścit utsaṅge śayanaṃ stananamārtarutaṃ gauravaṃ garbhakṛta[durbharatvā]dilakṣaṇaṃ tatkṛtaśca lkamaḥ glānirityete garbhiṇyā antarvat‍nyā dharmāḥ prasiddhā bahavo 'neke anyatra meghapaṅktiṣu.........darśitā adhyastā ityayamanekadharmasamādhiḥ ||
samādhiḥ so 'yaṃ vyāpakaḥ subhagaśceti [34b] praśaṃsāmukhena nigamayannāha—
tadetat kāvyasarvasvaṃ samādhirnāma yo guṇaḥ |
kavisārthaḥ samagro 'pi tamenamanugacchati || 100 ||
tadetadanantaroktaṃ kāvyas yathoktasya gadyapadyamiśrātmakasya sarvasvaṃ sāraṃ tatparāyaṇatvātkāvyasyeti sāmānyoktiriyam | kiṃ taditi nirminatti | samādhirnāma yo guṇa iti yo 'yamanantaraṃ vibhaktaḥ samādhirnāma samādhisamākhyo guṇo dharmastataśca samagraḥ sarvo 'pi naika eṃva, kavisārthaḥ kavijanaḥ tamenaṃ prakṛtaṃ samādhimanugacchati samāśrayati prayuṅkta iti yāvat | tataścobhayorapi vartmanorayaṃ sādhāraṇa itīdamapi prāyo guṇeṣu saṃgṛhītaṃ dṛṣṭamiti ||
﻿
tadevaṃ prasphuṭāntaratvaṃ mārgayoryathāpratijñātaṃ prasādhya nigamayannāha—
iti mārgadvayaṃ bhinnaṃ tatsvarūpanirūpaṇāt |
tadbhedāstu na śakyante vak‍tuṃ pratikavi sthitāḥ || 101 ||
iti yathoktena prakāreṇa mārgadvayaṃ vaidarbho gauḍīyaśca mārgaḥ bhinnaṃ prasphuṭāntarama | kutaḥ ? tasya mārgadvayasya svarūpam aviparītasvabhāvaḥ, ś‍leṣādisvarūpaṃ vidarbhamārgasya tadviparyayasvarūpaṃ gauḍīyasya | tasya nirūpaṇāt vivecanāt yathāvihitād hetoḥ | yadi mārgadvayaṃ vivicyate yathāvat tato labhyate parisphuṭamantaram | ye tu na vijānanti tairekīkṛtametat | tataścābhedo 'tra samāropitaḥ | bhedastu vāstava ityākūtam | yathoktaṃ prāk | kiyantastarhi prabhedā vaidarbhamārgasya kiyanto vā [35a] gauḍīyasya yataḥ parisphuṭamantaraṃ bhedasāmānyapraviśeṣamidaṃ taditi gamyata ityāha—tadbhedāstvityādi | tuśabdo 'rthāntaravivakṣāyām | tasya mārgadvayasya bhedā avāntarāḥ prakārāḥ | yathoktasāmānyalakṣaṇanyastā anantāḥ gavāśvaprabhedavat, kimāśrayāḥ ? pratikavi sthitāḥ kaviṃ kaviṃ prati pratikavi | ye kecidiha kavayaḥ sambhavanti mārgadvayānusāriṇaste tadāśrayā itastato vyavasthitāḥ | na tu kvacidekatra parisaṃkhyātāstiṣṭhanti | tasmāt vaktuṃ sākalyena vivarītuṃ na śakyante ānantyāditi bhāvaḥ ||
yadi tāvatsanti kiṃ na vaktuṃ śakyante ? vak‍tumaśakyāstu na santyeva te | tataśca yathoktamapi bhedasāmānyamasadiva |
nirviśeṣaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ bhavecchaśaviṣāṇavat | ityeva śaṅkānaikāntikametat | sato 'pi kathañcid vaktumaśakyasya darśanāditi pratipādayannāha—
ikṣukṣīraguḍādīnāṃ mādhuryasyāntaraṃ mahat |
tathāpi na tadākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate || 102 ||
ikṣukṣīraguḍadrākṣādīnāṃ madhuradravyāṇāṃ mādhuryasya sāmānyadharmasya pratidravyaṃ viśeṣātmanā antaraṃ bhedo mahat parisphuṭam | tathāpi tadantaraṃ sarasvatyāpi vāgadhidevatayāpi ākhyātuṃ vaktuṃ vibhāgenāsyedṛśaṃ mādhuryamasyedṛśamiti na śakyate | prāgevānyena | kevalamanubhavagamyaṃ tat | sāmānyaśabdena madhuramiti tu vyapadiśyate | yadyapīkṣo﻿
ranyādṛśaṃ mādhuryaṃ kṣīrasyānyādṛśamityādi kathyate tathāpi na tathā śabdād gamyate yathānubhūyate parisphuṭaṃ tadantaram | na caitāvatā tadasadevānubhava[35b]siddhasya durapahna[va]tvāt | tathā mālatīmallikācampakapāṭalādīnāṃ saurabhyasya mahadantaraṃ tathāpi na tattathā vaktuṃ śakyate, yathānubhūyate | tathāvidhā hi vācikā śaktiḥ sāmānyaikatā nāma | ko nu paryanuyujyatām ? yathoktamācāryadharmakīrtinā sakalavidvajjanacūḍāmaṇinā—
tadrūpaṃ sarvato bhinnaṃ tathā tatpratipādikā |
na śrutiḥ kalpanā [vā]sti sāmānyenaiva vṛttitaḥ | iti || [pramāṇavarttike 3.90]
yathā surabhikusu[māntarbhūtaṃ] pārijātaṃ syāt | yaduktaṃ sarasvatyāpi ca vaktuṃ na śakyata iti, [tat sādhu,] tayāpi vācakaśabdaśakteranyathā kartṛmaśakyatvāt | tadevaṃ mārgadvayasya prabhedāḥ yadyapi pratikavi sthitā vidyante vastutastathāpi vaktumāna[ntyā]t...... atiprasaṅgācca na śakyante viśeṣeṇa pratyekam | naitāvatā na santyeva | sāmānyena tu mārgadvayasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśitameva vyaktam | prativyakti tu vaktuṃ ko nāma śaknuyāt | sarvatraiva lakṣaṇaśāstre sarvabhedavyāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate | na tu tadbhedāḥ parisaṃkhyāyante | atrāpi saiva vyavasthā kāvyalakṣaṇaśāstratvādasya | na tu yathoktaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaparisphuṭābhamanusaradbhirabhiyuktaiste bhedā mārgadvayasaṃbhavino vivecayituṃ śakyante | yathedṛśaṃ nīlamīdṛśaṃ pītamiti vyutpādite[36a]na bhedalakṣaṇena vyaktamubhayasambhavinaḥ pratibhedā yathādarśanaṃ vibhajyante ityalaṃ vistareṇa ||
seyaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇaprayojanasvabhāvā kāvyaguṇadoṣavivekarūpā vyutpattiryāmabhisandhāya kriyāvidhiṃ nibabandhuḥ sūrayaḥ, tasya kiṃ prayojanamitīdānīmavasaraṃ prāpya prayojanaṃ varṇyannāha—
naisargikī ca pratibhā śrutaṃ ca bahu nirmalam |
amandaścābhiyogo 'syāḥ kāraṇaṃ kāvyasampadaḥ || 103 ||
naisargikī svābhāvikī janmāntarābhyāsa[sa]mbhavinī | sahajeti yāvat | pratibhā heyopādeyaparicchedalakṣaṇā | sā ca prakaraṇāt kāvyaviṣayā | sahajā śaktiriyam | utpādyāṃ darśayannāha—śrutaṃ cetyādi | śrutaṃ kāvyāṅgavidyāśravaṇaṃ śrutamayaṃ tacca
vyākaraṇakriyākalpachandovicityādyanekavidyāviṣayatvāt, anekaśaḥ pravṛttatvācca bahu paryāptaṃ nirmalaṃ pariśuddham, ām‍nāyaviśuddhyā sandehaviparyāsavirahāt | evaṃ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ paripūrṇamabhidhāya cintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca darśayannāha—amandaścābhiyoga iti | śrutasya cintanamūhāpohamukhena yathām‍nāyamaviparītārthaniścayanam | niścitasya ca bhāvanamabhyāsaḥ āvṛttiḥ sthirīkaraṇamiti dvividho 'bhiyogaḥ abhyāsaḥ | sa cāmandaḥ paryāptaḥ yāvad‌bhāvitatvāt | tadetattrayarūpā kāvyaviṣayā vyu[tpa][36b]ttiḥ | evaṃ hi kāvyaṃ vyutpannaṃ bhavati yadi tadaṅgaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ śrutaṃ cintitaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca yathāvad bhavet | anyathā kīdṛśī kāvyavyutpattiḥ sarvatropāyavyutpattilakṣaṇatvādupeyavyutpatteḥ | [tadṛte co]peyavyutpattirasūtrapaṭāt na hīyate | abhimānamātraṃ tu vijṛmbhatām | kastasya niṣeddhā ? tadevaṃvidhāḥ kāvyavyutpattiḥ kāraṇaṃ kāvyasampadaḥ kāvyaracanāyā niravadyāyāḥ hetuḥ | asyāḥ prastutāyā yadarthā kāvyavyutpattiḥ | parakīyakāvyaparijñānaṃ tu sulabhamevedṛśīṃ kāvyavyutpattimāśritavatā | tataśca kīrtilābhaḥ satkāraḥ anyo vā puruṣārtha iti gamyata eva | vakṣyati ca kīrtimīpsubhiḥ [1. 105] iti ||
nanu kecideva sahajaśaktiyuktāḥ | tatkimidānīṃ mā bhūdanyeṣāmiha pravṛttiḥ ? yenocyate naisargikī ca pratibhetyatra āha—
na vidyate yadyapi pūrvavāsanā- guṇānubandhi pratibhānamadbhutam |
śratena yatnena ca vāgupāsitā dhruvaṃ karotyeva kamapyanugraham || 104 ||
pūrvavāsanā janmāntarābhyāsāhitaḥ saṃskāraḥ abhyāsānubandhitvāt | yathoktamācāryaśūreṇa—
abhyāsayogena śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi sātmyaiva bhavanti puṃsām |
tathāvidhānyeva yadaprayatnā- jjanmāntare svap‍na ivācaranti || iti |
[jātakamālāyām pṛḥ 95] ﻿
pūrvā cāsau pūrvajanmabhāvitatvāt, vāsanā ceti vigrahaḥ | saiva guṇo viśeṣaḥ, sadbhiḥ stutatvāt | [37a] tasyā vā guṇaḥ yathāpratyayaṃ prabodhaḥ svānurūpakāryajananābhimukhalakṣaṇo viśeṣastaṃ hetubhāvena anubadh‍nāti, apekṣata iti pūrvavāsanāguṇānubandhi | pratibhānaṃ prajñā tacca prakaraṇāt kāvyaviṣayakam | adbhutamāścaryaṃ lokasya kathamīdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ yatheti vismayajanakatvād durlabhaṃ vādbhutam | naisargikī pratibheti yāvat | yadyapina vidyate yeṣāṃ tairapi kāvyābhyāsaḥ karaṇīyaḥ | evaṃ nāsau niṣphalā bhaviṣyatītyāha—śrutenetyādi | śrutena kāvyāṅgavidyāviṣayeṇa śravaṇena bahunā nirmalena | yathoktaṃ prāk | yatnena cābhiyogena amandena yathoktaṃ pūrvam | karaṇena hetunā puruṣeṇopāsitā samārādhitā abhyasteti yāvat | vāk kāvyāṅgakriyākalpādividyālakṣaṇaviśiṣṭā arthātprakaraṇādvā tadanyathānupapattyā kāvyasampado 'rthaḥ sāmarthyam | kāvyavyutpattiprastāvaḥ prakaraṇam | yathoktam—
arthaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ śabdasyānyasya sannidhiḥ |
sāmānyavāciśabdānāṃ viśeṣasthitihetavaḥ || iti | [tula॰ vākyapadīyam]
aparanyāyo yathāsambhavamiha sarvo 'nusartavyaḥ sāmānyoktibhūyastvāt | kamapi kañcit sahajaśaktyavirahe yādṛśaṃ tatkalpamanugrahaṃ kāvyaracanāsāma[rthyadāna]lakṣaṇam | dhruvamavaśyaṃ karo[37b]tyeva upāsituḥ puruṣasya | nātra sandehaḥ | tasmānnaisargikī pratibhā nāsti mameti nopāsitavyaiva sarasvatī | kāmadhenuravaśyamevānugrahīṣyatīti [dhyeyam] ||
tadastatandrairaniśaṃ sarasvatī śramādupāsyā khalu kīrtimīpsubhiḥ |
kṛśe kavitve 'pi janāḥ kṛtaśramā vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartumīśate || 105 ||
yata evaṃ na niṣphalaṃ vāgupāsanaṃ tattasmāt kāraṇāt astatandrairanalaso bhūtvā aniśam anavaratam abhiyogāvicchedāt kramāt śrutacintābhāvanākrameṇa sampradāyasādguṇyārthavartinā yathoktaṃ prāk | upāsyā samārādhyā | abhyasanīyā yāvatprasīdati | yathoktamācāryamātṛceṭena— ﻿
adhītya tāvat khilameva bhidyate kṛṣistu tasya śramaṇādvibhāvyate |
tataḥ svacintāmayabījamupyate vicāraṇāṅgastu vivarddhate 'ṅkuraḥ ||
tataḥ prasādottamasasyamāpyate vidhānaparyāptamamandaniścayaiḥ || iti |
sarasvatī kāvyāṅgavidyālakṣaṇā prakaraṇāderyathoktaṃ prāk | khalu [ai]kāntena asaṃśayam vā | kīrtiḥ pariśuddhakāvyakriyālakṣaṇā pūrvoktā, kāvyasampadaḥ ekāntena kīrtihetutvāt | āvartate sa evārthaḥ punararthāntarāśrayāditi nyāyāt | tatsambhavā khyātirvā, guṇebhya eva prabhavanti kīrtaya iti vacanāt | tāmanaśvarīṃ satpuruṣatanumaśeṣajanasubhagāṃ vyāpinīṃ guṇādhirājavaijayantīmīpsubhi[ravāptu]kāmaiḥ pu[38a]ruṣaiḥ | upāsyeti prakṛtam | tathā lābhasatkārādikamapi draṣṭavyam | na tu [sā vāsanā] mama nāstīti ālasyamālambanīyaṃ tasyānarthahetutvāt | yathoktamācāryāśvaghoṣeṇa—
ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavejjagatyanarthaḥ ko vidvāniha na bhaveddhaneśvaro vā ||
āla[sya]davaniriyaṃ sasāgarā [hi] saṃpūrṇā narapaśubhiśca nirdhanaiśca || [ ]
atha kathañcit svayaṃ kāvyakriyālasaścetat tādṛśaḥ tathāpi parakāvyakovidaḥ svayaṃ ca kiñcitkaraḥ tadvidāmādeyo bhaviṣyatīti sarvathāvaiphalyaparihāramāha—kṛśa ityādi | kavitve svayaṃ kāvyakaraṇe kṛśe mande 'pi sati sargabandhādyanirvahaṇāt | kṛśe vā asati kavitve 'pi muktakāderapi akaraṇāt | tathāpi darśanāt | bhinnā hi śaktiḥ puṃsām | yathoktam—
ekastāvad racayitumalaṃ śrotumevāparastā- manyaḥ karttṛṃ tadubhayamapi jñātumeko 'bhiyuktaḥ |
natvekasminnatiśayavatāṃ sannipāto guṇānā- mekaḥ sūte kanakamupalastatparīkṣākṣamo 'nyaḥ || iti ||
﻿
kṛtaśramā yathāvidhānamupāsitavāco janāḥ puruṣāḥ kṛto 'nuṣṭhitaḥ śramaḥ śravaṇādilakṣaṇo vyavahāro yairiti [38b] vigrahaḥ, parakāvyakovidatvāt | vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartumīśate | vidagdhāḥ kavayaḥ teṣāṃ goṣṭhīṣu kāvyālāpeṣu vidyāramaṇīmekhalānūpura[śiñjiteṣu] sakalakalānadīviśrāmasamudreṣu nānārasabhāvābhinayamahānaṭeṣu śabdapārāyaṇamahārṇavaratnāṅkureṣu śāstrapariśramaphalodayamahotsaveṣu kavisāgarāmṛteṣu budhajanamanastaskareṣu vividhālaṅkārahāriṣu vandanīyeṣu vidagdhatābhūmisīmānteṣu vidvatsaraṇiprapābhūtātiśayeṣu svayaṃkṛteṣu adhyātmaśāstrakalākauśalavarṇaneṣu satāmuciteṣu tadekarūpeṣvapi pratipuruṣamapūrvapariṇāmitayā paramātmadeśīyeṣu sarasvatīprasādamahāvareṣu lakṣmīpūjābhājaneṣu nirudvegasukhasvabhāvatvāt kaivalyakalpeṣvatalabhāvagambhīratvāt parārthaprasattiguṇayogācca sāgareṣviva mahāhradeṣu satpuruṣacaritādarśabhittiṣu yaśaḥkusumāmodasurabhiṣu mahākavikīrtistambheṣu kiṃ bahunā saṃsārasārasandoheṣu |
taduktam—
saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣasya dvayamevāmṛtaṃ phalam |
subhāṣitarasāsvādaḥ sadbhiśca saha saṅgatam || iti ||
vihartumabhijñātatayā 'ntarbhavitumīśa[39a]te kalpante | akṛtaśramāṇāṃ tu pallavagrāhiṇāmavalepināmanātmavidāṃ vidagdhagoṣṭhīvihāra upahāsa eva syāt | yathoktamācāryamātṛceṭena—
na paṭhyate sādhujano na sevyate na cintyate saṃsadi vaktumiṣyate |
tathāvidhānāmata eva bhāratī daridralīleva bhṛśaṃ na śobhate ||
kathaṃ kathāmārgamahāmahodadhi- taṭāmbusevāsamaye 'pyaśikṣitāḥ |
praveṣṭumicchanti taduttarottara- prakarṣapātālatalāśrayāṃ gatim ||

sthirodakeṣu vyavadātavikrama- staraṅgiṇīṃ yaḥ sahasā vigāhate |
navāmbuvegoddhatarodhasaṃ gatiṃ tṛṇāśmanoranyatarāṃ sa gacchati ||
sudṛṣṭaśāstro 'pi hi sajjanākule vimṛṣya sādhuḥ sadasi pravartate |
vaśīva sarvatra tu vītasaṃbhramaḥ samudvamatyeva khalaḥ svavāgviṣam ||
punaḥ prakarṣanti viśanti hṛt satāṃ harantyavaskandya naredravaddhuram |
kṣipatyagādhe 'pi kathārṇave mukhaṃ nipītabhūyiṣṭhamidaṃ jagat khalaiḥ ||
vināgamaṃ tadvidupāsanaṃ vinā vinābhiyogaṃ pratibhāguṇaṃ vinā |
vinābhiśāpaṃ mativibhramaṃ vinā na vaktumicchā puruṣasya jāyate || iti |
varamevamanadhītavidyo na pu[na]rdu radhītavidyaḥ | yathoktamācā[39b]ryakambalena—
yaḥ sarvathā[ndha]stimirāhataśca tayorvaraṃ pūrvaka eva nūnam |
andho 'hamasmītyavalepaśūnyo na bhā[nudṛ]ktaimiriko 'bhimānī || iti ||
svayamevamupahataṃ tapasvinamaparāparadūṣaṇecchā bādhate | seyamanyā viḍambanā | yathoktamācāryamātṛceṭena—
samātiriktavyasanī ya eṣa san parān parāhantyabhihatya vākśaraiḥ |
sa pūtināsā kupitendriyaḥ svayaṃ vṛṇoti durgandhabhayena nāsikām ||

parāpacāreṣvatitīkṣṇacakṣuṣo nimīlitākṣaśca yatheṣṭaceṣṭite |
rajasvalāḥ santa ime svayaṃ kathaṃ kiranti lokasya rajāṃsi sūca[kāḥ] ||
yathātathā śa[kya]midaṃ titikṣituṃ sadāgaso yaddhi tudantyaruntudāḥ |
aduṣṭasandūṣaṇa[vaiśasaṃ tu] yat tadāsu[raṃ] kamya mano na kampayet ||
sataḥ prakāśānapi nekṣate guṇān kuto 'pi doṣānasato 'vagacchati |
kutastadīdṛṅnayanaṃ samudgataṃ yadīkṣate 'sat sati na pravartate ||
tadapyalaṃ soḍhamapaṇḍitājjanā- danīkṣamāṇo hi [karoti duḥsaham] |
guṇāntarajñastu jano 'tidurjanaḥ vahanti sādhūṃstadupekṣyatāṃ katham ||
guṇaughapuṇyasya tu pattanaṃ paraṃ guṇāntarajño jana eva kevalaḥ |
tato 'pi yadyāpadiyaṃ samu[tthi]tā kva tarhi gacchantu parāyaṇā guṇāḥ ||
[40a]kiyadasaccaritamalena jihvāṃ limpāmaḥ | seyaṃ pūyatāmatyantaśīte[na] prasannena surabhiṇā bhuvana[pāvanena] saccaritapuṇyodakena |
ṛjusvabhāvo 'pi badhyate śaṭhai- rna doṣavinnaiva na cāpyaruntudaḥ |
nato na sarvatra gato na dīnatā- maho vicitrāḥ purūṣasya nītayaḥ ||

parāpavādeṣu nirātmavarṇavān gato niyuktānyaguṇeṣu vāgmitām |
ripūnapi śreyasi dhātumīhate manasvinaśceyamalaukikī sthitiḥ ||
yathā yathā dūṣaṇatatparaḥ [para]- stathā tathā tadguṇalāpalālasaḥ |
nitāntadākṣiṇyamahāmahodadhe- rmanasvinaḥ keyamatīva vāmatā ||
priyaṃvadaḥ kṣepakṛte kṣamāparaḥ [na kupyati] prāṇahare 'pi dakṣiṇaḥ |
alaukikaṃ sarvamitīdamīdṛṣaṃ mahānubhāvaḥ kuta eṣa śikṣitaḥ ||
prasannavākkāyamanaḥkriyāpathaḥ punāti sākṣādiva dharmasañcayaḥ |
śruto 'tha dṛṣṭaḥ samudāharan giraḥ sunītagarbhāḥ sujanaḥ smṛto 'pi vā ||
sa eṣa sādhurbhuvanaikapāvanaḥ prasannamṛgyaḥ kvacidatra dṛśyate |
api sthirāṃ prītimi[māṃ] na saṃharet kalerguṇonmūlanadharmavarmitaḥ ||
punastathaiva sthitirūrjitāśrayā guṇotsavānāmapi nāma sambhavet |
guṇaiśca yeṣāmiva sūryaraśmibhi- rnyalīyatādo[40b]ṣavipakṣavikramaḥ ||
nivṛttaniḥśeṣaviśeṣaviplavaṃ parasparaṃ sadguṇalolupaṃ jagat |
yaśaskarīṃ tāṃ dhuramādipauruṣāṃ punaḥ pravṛttāṃ vidadhātu śāśvatīm ||
nirastadaurgatyasamṛddhiśīkaraḥ śubhodayāttṛptasamastasajjanaḥ |
punastathā sadvaraśāstrasaṃkathā- vinodaramyaḥ sama[yaḥ] pravartatām ||
prakṛtamidānīṃ samāpyatām | tadevaṃ kāvyaracanākīrtaye kāvyavyutpattaye ca kāvyalakṣaṇaśāstrasya prayojanamiti |
mataṃ khilaprāyamihāsti daṇḍinaḥ tadetadatra prakṛtaṃ parisphuṭam |
itaḥ purastāt samameva vartate tadatra nāsmābhirabhāvito vidhiḥ ||
